2020-10-20T07:18:40.249447+00:00 2021-02-27T16:00:00+00:00 false sky-cable-corporation ABOUT SKY

SKY Cable Corporation is the pay television and broadband arm of ABS-CBN, the Philippines’ leading media and entertainment company.

Since introducing cable television to Filipinos in 1990, it has become a frontrunner in pay TV and broadband services that offer rich content that entertain, educate, inspire, and offer experiences to Filipinos, whom it considers as its Kapamilyas.

Today, it serves Filipinos through various products under SKYdirect, SKY Fiber, and SKYcable.

SKYcable is a Pay TV service offering HD cable TV with top-notch programming and the widest selection of channels on offer by any cable provider; and SKY Fiber, a high-speed broadband for the home and beyond.

SKYdirect, now in over one million homes nationwide, brings SKY’s superior brand of cable entertainment options to more areas, beyond the urban centers via direct-to-home television technology.

SKY serves the business community through SKYBIZ, Its corporate and commercial arm, which delivers content (SKYcable) and connectivity (SKY Fiber) services to any business of any size.		 17061 Cable and Telecommunications https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/www.kalibrr.com/logos/YRBMYTQF3DTVF5CA8X8H3R9YA46P7R77P2BYHV97-5e4e207b.png Sky Cable Corporation false true sky-cable-corporation ABOUT SKY

Since its inception in 1998, VST ECS Phils., Inc. has repeatedly updated its portfolio with new and leading-edge solutions. As a result, it has evolved into one of the recognized local IT distributors in the country offering a comprehensive line-up
of products, solutions, and services for multi-industries. Ranked in the Top 200 companies in the Philippines, VST ECS has continuously redefined and broadened its portfolio of products and services to fully address the evolving market needs.

<p>Do you love food and convenience put together? Then you will definitely love foodpanda!</p>

<p>foodpanda (small ‘f’) is the world’s favorite way to order food online from the comfort of your home or office. Whether it’s getting your hands on your favorite pasta, kebab or pizza, we believe that no one should have to suffer from hunger attacks ever again.</p>

<p>However this doesn’t happen without some really awesome people making it happen! We are currently looking for a<strong> Business Intelligence Analyst </strong>to join our team in our Manila office!</p>

<p><strong>What’s on your menu?</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>Monitor performance indicators of business, identifying causes/trends and drive data-based decision making through creation of insightful reports</li>
<li>Interpret results of promotions and systems, making valuable suggestions to raise performance of future iterations</li>
<li>Support department heads in their analytical needs to help them make data-driven decisions by preparing, analyzing and presenting data to them</li>
<li>Work in diverse fields such as Operations, Account Management, Marketing, Sales and Finance departments</li>
<li>Prepare ad-hoc analysis as well as regular reporting</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>What we offer:</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>A dynamic and challenging working environment</li>
<li>An extra steep learning curve</li>
<li>Responsibility from day one in a fast growing and global company</li>
<li>A vibrant and international team with diverse backgrounds</li>
<li>Regular company and team events</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Up for a challenge? Apply Now!</strong></p>

(TESI) is a Business Process Outsourcing (BPO)company incorporated in March 2001, as an IT - enabled and BPO Shared Services provider to Transnational Diversified Group’s(TDG) member companies, principals and joint-venture partners and external clients.

TESI provides business process outsourcing, business process reengineering, business process management, contact center services, application development, computer based training development, remote data processing , web development and technical support services.

- Pharmaceutical active ingredients
- Excipients and auxiliaries
- Food ingredients and raw materials
- Feed ingredients and veterinary raw materials
- Cosmetic raw materials
- Commodities
- Industrial chemicals

Our Headquarters are located in Parañaque City, Metro Manila, Philippines. The Representative Office is situated in Ho Chi Minh City (Saigon), Vietnam.

History

Our years of first-hand frontline experience in the marketplace, know-how in sourcing from manufacturers and traders world-wide, and European Management with Oriental Expertise provide both, suppliers and clients, with a reliable partner for a long-term business relationship and mutual benefit.

WHY JOIN US?

Rudolf Lietz Inc. recognizes how strong work performance makes the company successful.

One way to accomplish this is to offer a comprehensive benefit program designed to meet your basic and life-changing benefit needs. From full medical coverage to generous paid holidays and vacations. RLI's package is consistently and continually being assessed to ensure competitiveness.

Cultures and Values

Rudolf Lietz Inc. is a German-Filipino company located at Paranaque City, Philippines. Our culture follows that of similar German companies where we take pride on being organised, working to the book and executing high quality work. It is of utmost importance to stay not just one but several steps ahead of the competition but doing so through the quality of work. We also invite our team members to be creative with the work they do often working in smaller teams to solve much bigger problem.

2020-10-08T03:39:40.872813+00:00 2020-12-29T16:00:00+00:00 false sky-cable-corporation ABOUT SKY

SKY Cable Corporation is the pay television and broadband arm of ABS-CBN, the Philippines’ leading media and entertainment company.

Since introducing cable television to Filipinos in 1990, it has become a frontrunner in pay TV and broadband services that offer rich content that entertain, educate, inspire, and offer experiences to Filipinos, whom it considers as its Kapamilyas.

Today, it serves Filipinos through various products under SKYdirect, SKY Fiber, and SKYcable.

SKYcable is a Pay TV service offering HD cable TV with top-notch programming and the widest selection of channels on offer by any cable provider; and SKY Fiber, a high-speed broadband for the home and beyond.

SKYdirect, now in over one million homes nationwide, brings SKY’s superior brand of cable entertainment options to more areas, beyond the urban centers via direct-to-home television technology.

SKY serves the business community through SKYBIZ, Its corporate and commercial arm, which delivers content (SKYcable) and connectivity (SKY Fiber) services to any business of any size.		 17061 Cable and Telecommunications https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/www.kalibrr.com/logos/YRBMYTQF3DTVF5CA8X8H3R9YA46P7R77P2BYHV97-5e4e207b.png Sky Cable Corporation false true sky-cable-corporation ABOUT SKY

SKY Cable Corporation is the pay television and broadband arm of ABS-CBN, the Philippines’ leading media and entertainment company.

Since introducing cable television to Filipinos in 1990, it has become a frontrunner in pay TV and broadband services that offer rich content that entertain, educate, inspire, and offer experiences to Filipinos, whom it considers as its Kapamilyas.

Today, it serves Filipinos through various products under SKYdirect, SKY Fiber, and SKYcable.

SKYcable is a Pay TV service offering HD cable TV with top-notch programming and the widest selection of channels on offer by any cable provider; and SKY Fiber, a high-speed broadband for the home and beyond.

SKYdirect, now in over one million homes nationwide, brings SKY’s superior brand of cable entertainment options to more areas, beyond the urban centers via direct-to-home television technology.

The business holds its main office at Novaliches, Quezon City with branch offices based in Cavite (Carmona), Batangas (Tanauan) and Pampanga (San Fernando).

The company takes pride in the successful completion of multiple subdivisions in over two decades of operations. Through aggressive sales and marketing thrusts, it boasts of having expanded in areas like Bulacan, Cavite, Laguna, Rizal and Caloocan. As the housing needs of people continue to expand, augmented by low interest rate for housing loans, the potential sales and development of new housing projects for the Company is projected to rise in the future.

Serving as the moral fibre for all these activities is an excellent, vibrant workforce of more than 500, led by an equally dynamic Board composed of renowned businessmen.

Borland Development Corporation is a proud member of Subdivision & Housing Developers Association, Inc. (SHDA) and Chamber of Real Estate & Builders Association, Inc. (CREBA).		 11496 Real Estate / Mortgage https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/www.kalibrr.com/logos/78P4JDMVZYEL9PG57NXAU78B23JX36PBELWD3A8B-5d2edd79.png Borland Development Corporation false true borland-development-corporation Borland Development Corporation was registered with the Securities &amp; Exchange Commission on March 23, 1990 as a company primarily engaged in real estate development. 2020-10-08T05:49:22.699406+00:00 2020-11-29T16:00:00+00:00 18000 false filstar-distributors-corporation Filstar Distributors Corporation maintains the prestige of being the exclusive licensee of Hallmark Cards in the Philippines since 1974. In addition, it was made the authorized distributor of the following brands:

• Pioneer Balloons from the U.S.A. in 1995
• BIC Stationery products from France in 2001; BIC Lighters and Shavers (exclusive distributorship)
• Everts Balloons from Malaysia in 2003
• Martha Stewart Crafts
• Scentco
• Disney Art Attack in 2012 (Licensee)
• Crayola (Licensee)

The company was the first to introduce the scrapbooking hobby in the Philippines, creating the brand Craft Easy, formerly known as All About Scrapbooking.

Other of its locally-created brands include:

• Celebration Balloons
• Wrapsody - a line of high-end quality gift wrap paper with special effects
• Wrap 'Em Up – ribbons and quick gift wrapping ideas
• Photofun photo albums

THE STORY OF THE HALLMARK BRAND AND FILSTAR, THE COMPANY, IN THE PHILIPPINES

The beginnings of Hallmark in the Philippines had its share of twists and charm. In 1969, people from Kansas City, U.S.A., home of the Hallmark headquarters, came to the Philippines looking for a local licensee. It was in National Book Store (NBS) that Hallmark discovered the qualities they too valued: the premium placed on excellence and the right attitude towards growth. These were the same qualities which the founder of NBS, Mrs. Socorro C. Ramos, valued.

It was a Good Friday when Mrs. Ramos was approached by Hallmark U.S.A. Thereafter, she went to Kansas City to arrange the deal and successfully came back with the license to manufacture and distribute Hallmark in the Philippines. It was on her kitchen table that the very first cards were planned. This was in 1973, the start of the Hallmark- NBS partnership. The next year, Hallmark cards made their appearance on the racks of National Book Store.

What followed were years of astounding growth and excellence. In product lines, from Christmas to everyday themes, more greeting cards and other excellent products have been added on each year to establish a full line of quality Hallmark merchandise.

Today, Filstar distributes to 1,000 outlets nationwide and has evolved to be a distributor of not just Hallmark, but of other products that supplement and enhance the personal expressions industry. The successful introduction of the All About Scrapbooking brand spearheaded the art of scrapbooking in the Philippines. It is now the top of mind brand of scrapbooking enthusiasts and hobbyists.		 22812 Retail Industry https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/HE3KW56HQ9WRQHMYHZ4Y-5a2118fe.png Filstar Distributors Corporation true true filstar-distributors-corporation Filstar Distributors Corporation maintains the prestige of being the exclusive licensee of Hallmark Cards in the Philippines since 1974. In addition, it was made the authorized distributor of the following brands:

• Pioneer Balloons from the U.S.A. in 1995
• BIC Stationery products from France in 2001; BIC Lighters and Shavers (exclusive distributorship)
• Everts Balloons from Malaysia in 2003
• Martha Stewart Crafts
• Scentco
• Disney Art Attack in 2012 (Licensee)
• Crayola (Licensee)

The company was the first to introduce the scrapbooking hobby in the Philippines, creating the brand Craft Easy, formerly known as All About Scrapbooking.

Other of its locally-created brands include:

• Celebration Balloons
• Wrapsody - a line of high-end quality gift wrap paper with special effects
• Wrap 'Em Up – ribbons and quick gift wrapping ideas
• Photofun photo albums

THE STORY OF THE HALLMARK BRAND AND FILSTAR, THE COMPANY, IN THE PHILIPPINES

The beginnings of Hallmark in the Philippines had its share of twists and charm. In 1969, people from Kansas City, U.S.A., home of the Hallmark headquarters, came to the Philippines looking for a local licensee. It was in National Book Store (NBS) that Hallmark discovered the qualities they too valued: the premium placed on excellence and the right attitude towards growth. These were the same qualities which the founder of NBS, Mrs. Socorro C. Ramos, valued.

It was a Good Friday when Mrs. Ramos was approached by Hallmark U.S.A. Thereafter, she went to Kansas City to arrange the deal and successfully came back with the license to manufacture and distribute Hallmark in the Philippines. It was on her kitchen table that the very first cards were planned. This was in 1973, the start of the Hallmark- NBS partnership. The next year, Hallmark cards made their appearance on the racks of National Book Store.

What followed were years of astounding growth and excellence. In product lines, from Christmas to everyday themes, more greeting cards and other excellent products have been added on each year to establish a full line of quality Hallmark merchandise.

Today, Filstar distributes to 1,000 outlets nationwide and has evolved to be a distributor of not just Hallmark, but of other products that supplement and enhance the personal expressions industry. The successful introduction of the All About Scrapbooking brand spearheaded the art of scrapbooking in the Philippines. VST ECS Phils., Inc. is more than just a distribution company. Our name stands for dynamic growth, well-diversified products and solutions, strong brands, extensive channel network, efficient infrastructure, and professional workforce. We continue to embrace changes in our industry.

Since its inception in 1998, VST ECS Phils., Inc. has repeatedly updated its portfolio with new and leading-edge solutions. As a result, it has evolved into one of the recognized local IT distributors in the country offering a comprehensive line-up
of products, solutions, and services for multi-industries. Ranked in the Top 200 companies in the Philippines, VST ECS has continuously redefined and broadened its portfolio of products and services to fully address the evolving market needs.

Today, it boasts off an extensive array of solutions ranging from systems and peripherals, wired and wireless networks, security and communications, cloud and virtualization, multimedia and presentation, creative and CAD, mobility, cloud services, point-of-sale, automated data capture, structured-cabling, hyperconvergence, among others.

2020-10-28T07:26:27.296327+00:00 2020-12-28T16:00:00+00:00 23000 false filstar-distributors-corporation Filstar Distributors Corporation maintains the prestige of being the exclusive licensee of Hallmark Cards in the Philippines since 1974. In addition, it was made the authorized distributor of the following brands:

• Pioneer Balloons from the U.S.A. in 1995
• BIC Stationery products from France in 2001; BIC Lighters and Shavers (exclusive distributorship)
• Everts Balloons from Malaysia in 2003
• Martha Stewart Crafts
• Scentco
• Disney Art Attack in 2012 (Licensee)
• Crayola (Licensee)

The company was the first to introduce the scrapbooking hobby in the Philippines, creating the brand Craft Easy, formerly known as All About Scrapbooking.

Other of its locally-created brands include:

• Celebration Balloons
• Wrapsody - a line of high-end quality gift wrap paper with special effects
• Wrap 'Em Up – ribbons and quick gift wrapping ideas
• Photofun photo albums

THE STORY OF THE HALLMARK BRAND AND FILSTAR, THE COMPANY, IN THE PHILIPPINES

The beginnings of Hallmark in the Philippines had its share of twists and charm. In 1969, people from Kansas City, U.S.A., home of the Hallmark headquarters, came to the Philippines looking for a local licensee. It was in National Book Store (NBS) that Hallmark discovered the qualities they too valued: the premium placed on excellence and the right attitude towards growth. These were the same qualities which the founder of NBS, Mrs. Socorro C. Ramos, valued.

It was a Good Friday when Mrs. Ramos was approached by Hallmark U.S.A. Thereafter, she went to Kansas City to arrange the deal and successfully came back with the license to manufacture and distribute Hallmark in the Philippines. It was on her kitchen table that the very first cards were planned. This was in 1973, the start of the Hallmark- NBS partnership. The next year, Hallmark cards made their appearance on the racks of National Book Store.

What followed were years of astounding growth and excellence. In product lines, from Christmas to everyday themes, more greeting cards and other excellent products have been added on each year to establish a full line of quality Hallmark merchandise.

Today, Filstar distributes to 1,000 outlets nationwide and has evolved to be a distributor of not just Hallmark, but of other products that supplement and enhance the personal expressions industry. The successful introduction of the All About Scrapbooking brand spearheaded the art of scrapbooking in the Philippines. It is now the top of mind brand of scrapbooking enthusiasts and hobbyists.		 22812 Retail Industry https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/HE3KW56HQ9WRQHMYHZ4Y-5a2118fe.png Filstar Distributors Corporation true true filstar-distributors-corporation Filstar Distributors Corporation maintains the prestige of being the exclusive licensee of Hallmark Cards in the Philippines since 1974. In addition, it was made the authorized distributor of the following brands:

• Pioneer Balloons from the U.S.A. in 1995
• BIC Stationery products from France in 2001; BIC Lighters and Shavers (exclusive distributorship)
• Everts Balloons from Malaysia in 2003
• Martha Stewart Crafts
• Scentco
• Disney Art Attack in 2012 (Licensee)
• Crayola (Licensee)

The company was the first to introduce the scrapbooking hobby in the Philippines, creating the brand Craft Easy, formerly known as All About Scrapbooking.

Other of its locally-created brands include:

• Celebration Balloons
• Wrapsody - a line of high-end quality gift wrap paper with special effects
• Wrap 'Em Up – ribbons and quick gift wrapping ideas
• Photofun photo albums

The beginnings of Hallmark in the Philippines had its share of twists and charm. In 1969, people from Kansas City, U.S.A., home of the Hallmark headquarters, came to the Philippines looking for a local licensee. It was in National Book Store (NBS) that Hallmark discovered the qualities they too valued: the premium placed on excellence and the right attitude towards growth. These were the same qualities which the founder of NBS, Mrs. Socorro C. Ramos, valued.

It was a Good Friday when Mrs. Ramos was approached by Hallmark U.S.A. Thereafter, she went to Kansas City to arrange the deal and successfully came back with the license to manufacture and distribute Hallmark in the Philippines. It was on her kitchen table that the very first cards were planned. This was in 1973, the start of the Hallmark- NBS partnership. The next year, Hallmark cards made their appearance on the racks of National Book Store.

What followed were years of astounding growth and excellence. In product lines, from Christmas to everyday themes, more greeting cards and other excellent products have been added on each year to establish a full line of quality Hallmark merchandise.

Today, Filstar distributes to 1,000 outlets nationwide and has evolved to be a distributor of not just Hallmark, but of other products that supplement and enhance the personal expressions industry. CONVENIENCE One Stop Shop - One Day Hiring

After you arrive in ACES CALL CENTER JOBS, you will be processed within 30 minutes and know your possible options on where you are qualified.

Since 2011, over 10,000+ jobseekers found their job through ACES!

CHOICES Comprehensive Active Jobs

Choose from the 20+ Top Call Centers, 150+ locations, 800+ positions, 10,000+ vacancies. There is a perfect job for you in ACES. In ACES, we only endorse you to clients that you have the highest chance of getting hired. Come during our ACES Days and get Hired On The Spot (HOTS)

Since 2011, ACES has consistently been awarded as the Top 3 Recruitment Partner of choice of the Biggest BPOs and Call Centers.

Since 2011, ACES has given over 30,000,000.00 (Thirty million) worth of SODEXO Gift Checks to thousands of jobseekers hired through ACES.

2020-10-28T07:42:10.999563+00:00 2020-12-26T16:00:00+00:00 false kitchen-beauty Kitchen Beauty Marketing Corporation (KBMC) is a corporation that is taking the lead in bringing the most diversified lines of kitchen/home appliances with reliable quality, elegant designs, innovative features and affordable prices to every Filipino family, to satisfy the needs of the Philippine market by serving quality household appliances within the means of the customers through well-crafted business principles.

History

Founded in the year 1988, Kitchen Beauty Marketing started as an importer/distributor of various kitchen and household related products. Catering primarily to the mass consumer market, the company’s product ranged from stainless steel wares and small kitchen appliances.

KYOWA has been and still being recognized all throughout the country for their unwavering passion to serve and provide nothing but the best products in the market. Testifying to the slogan “Basta may Kyowa, ginhawa ka!” KYOWA continues to serve millions of Filipinos by exploring wider opportunities while providing efficient and well-selected quality products.

Since 2011, over 10,000+ jobseekers found their job through ACES!

CHOICES Comprehensive Active Jobs

Choose from the 20+ Top Call Centers, 150+ locations, 800+ positions, 10,000+ vacancies. There is a perfect job for you in ACES. In ACES, we only endorse you to clients that you have the highest chance of getting hired. Come during our ACES Days and get Hired On The Spot (HOTS)

Since 2011, ACES has consistently been awarded as the Top 3 Recruitment Partner of choice of the Biggest BPOs and Call Centers.

2020-10-27T09:10:25.884486+00:00 2020-12-25T16:00:00+00:00 20000 false boutique-outsource-solutions-pty-ltd-philippine-branch History

Boutique Outsource Solutions Pty Ltd. – Philippine Branch (BOS) was established in 2014 in response to a need to provide a more personalized approach to the provision of outsource staff. It was set up by its parent company in Australia to specialize in servicing Australian-based finance-related companies who want to set up off-shore operations in the Philippines.

The extensive experience of BOS executive management team and support professionals in the fields of mortgage, process management and business process outsourcing is our edge against the other players in the industry as we are able to deliver a truly exceptional level of service that is made more unique because of our ability to tailor our solutions to our clients’ needs.

And because we offer flexible solutions, our business model is equally effective across a variety of businesses. We give our clients the liberty and the ability to focus on improving their business processes while BOS works to ensure we provide them with all the rest of their operational requirements.

Our Vision

Our vision is to attain sustainable and profitable growth by providing the best quality boutique solutions and services to our clients achieved through our people’s diverse talents and skills in an environment that fosters passion, excellence, honesty and lasting relationships while keeping in mind that work should always be fun and empowering.

Boutique Outsource Solutions Pty Ltd. – Philippine Branch (BOS) was established in 2014 in response to a need to provide a more personalized approach to the provision of outsource staff. It was set up by its parent company in Australia to specialize in servicing Australian-based finance-related companies who want to set up off-shore operations in the Philippines.

The extensive experience of BOS executive management team and support professionals in the fields of mortgage, process management and business process outsourcing is our edge against the other players in the industry as we are able to deliver a truly exceptional level of service that is made more unique because of our ability to tailor our solutions to our clients’ needs.

And because we offer flexible solutions, our business model is equally effective across a variety of businesses. We give our clients the liberty and the ability to focus on improving their business processes while BOS works to ensure we provide them with all the rest of their operational requirements.

Our Vision

Our vision is to attain sustainable and profitable growth by providing the best quality boutique solutions and services to our clients achieved through our people’s diverse talents and skills in an environment that fosters passion, excellence, honesty and lasting relationships while keeping in mind that work should always be fun and empowering.

<p> </p>

<p>As <strong>BUNCH’s Business Controller,</strong> you will be a key leader for the financial operations of our rapidly growing company for both Hong Kong and Philippines office. You will be responsible for providing technical accounting expertise, improvement of financial processes, and development of a high performing accounting team. You must be a hands-on, roll up your sleeves type and should enjoy a fast-paced, innovative environment as well as the demonstrated experience growing and developing a team. Particularly important traits and skills include curiosity, intelligence, logical thinking, ability to prioritize and enthusiasm for change.</p>

<p><strong>Your daily grind</strong></p>

<p> </p>

<ul>
<li>Owning all of accounting and reporting, including revenue recognition, general ledger, accounts payable, payroll, taxes, treasury management, budgeting, product costing, equity and consolidation.</li>
<li>Oversee all aspects of consolidating and financial accounting at the Company for both HK and PH, including financial procedures and controls, financial period close, and financial statement preparation and analysis.</li>
<li>Oversee the Company's treasury banking relationships, including cash management and investing activities</li>
<li>Oversee, monitor, and analyze department work to develop more efficient procedures and use of resources</li>
<li>Proactively managing the Company’s cash, including planning, budgeting, and forecasting of weekly, monthly and annual cash flows</li>
</ul>

</ul>

<li>We are not a “Traditional Company”, BUNCH is a modern outsourcing house specialized in supporting high-growth tech companies around the world. The business holds its main office at Novaliches, Quezon City with branch offices based in Cavite (Carmona), Batangas (Tanauan) and Pampanga (San Fernando).

The company takes pride in the successful completion of multiple subdivisions in over two decades of operations. Through aggressive sales and marketing thrusts, it boasts of having expanded in areas like Bulacan, Cavite, Laguna, Rizal and Caloocan. As the housing needs of people continue to expand, augmented by low interest rate for housing loans, the potential sales and development of new housing projects for the Company is projected to rise in the future.

Serving as the moral fibre for all these activities is an excellent, vibrant workforce of more than 500, led by an equally dynamic Board composed of renowned businessmen.

Borland Development Corporation is a proud member of Subdivision & Housing Developers Association, Inc. (SHDA) and Chamber of Real Estate & Builders Association, Inc. (CREBA).		 11496 Real Estate / Mortgage https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/www.kalibrr.com/logos/78P4JDMVZYEL9PG57NXAU78B23JX36PBELWD3A8B-5d2edd79.png Borland Development Corporation false true borland-development-corporation Borland Development Corporation was registered with the Securities &amp; Exchange Commission on March 23, 1990 as a company primarily engaged in real estate development. 2020-09-10T05:24:00.874925+00:00 2020-11-09T23:23:24.464000+00:00 20000 false boutique-outsource-solutions-pty-ltd-philippine-branch History

Boutique Outsource Solutions Pty Ltd. – Philippine Branch (BOS) was established in 2014 in response to a need to provide a more personalized approach to the provision of outsource staff. It was set up by its parent company in Australia to specialize in servicing Australian-based finance-related companies who want to set up off-shore operations in the Philippines.

The extensive experience of BOS executive management team and support professionals in the fields of mortgage, process management and business process outsourcing is our edge against the other players in the industry as we are able to deliver a truly exceptional level of service that is made more unique because of our ability to tailor our solutions to our clients’ needs.

And because we offer flexible solutions, our business model is equally effective across a variety of businesses. We give our clients the liberty and the ability to focus on improving their business processes while BOS works to ensure we provide them with all the rest of their operational requirements.

Our Vision

Our vision is to attain sustainable and profitable growth by providing the best quality boutique solutions and services to our clients achieved through our people’s diverse talents and skills in an environment that fosters passion, excellence, honesty and lasting relationships while keeping in mind that work should always be fun and empowering.
 26721 Outsourcing / Offshoring https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/www.kalibrr.com/logos/5Y5R6VKPN5CDVHZ9642WQBH92QJ5HWF6RP9NXVP2-5f598f9d.png Boutique Outsource Solutions Pty. Ltd. - Philippine Branch true true boutique-outsource-solutions-pty-ltd-philippine-branch History

Boutique Outsource Solutions Pty Ltd. – Philippine Branch (BOS) was established in 2014 in response to a need to provide a more personalized approach to the provision of outsource staff. It was set up by its parent company in Australia to specialize in servicing Australian-based finance-related companies who want to set up off-shore operations in the Philippines.

The extensive experience of BOS executive management team and support professionals in the fields of mortgage, process management and business process outsourcing is our edge against the other players in the industry as we are able to deliver a truly exceptional level of service that is made more unique because of our ability to tailor our solutions to our clients’ needs.

And because we offer flexible solutions, our business model is equally effective across a variety of businesses. We give our clients the liberty and the ability to focus on improving their business processes while BOS works to ensure we provide them with all the rest of their operational requirements.

Our Vision

Our vision is to attain sustainable and profitable growth by providing the best quality boutique solutions and services to our clients achieved through our people’s diverse talents and skills in an environment that fosters passion, excellence, honesty and lasting relationships while keeping in mind that work should always be fun and empowering.

- Pharmaceutical active ingredients
- Excipients and auxiliaries
- Food ingredients and raw materials
- Feed ingredients and veterinary raw materials
- Cosmetic raw materials
- Commodities
- Industrial chemicals

Our Headquarters are located in Parañaque City, Metro Manila, Philippines. The Representative Office is situated in Ho Chi Minh City (Saigon), Vietnam.

History

Our years of first-hand frontline experience in the marketplace, know-how in sourcing from manufacturers and traders world-wide, and European Management with Oriental Expertise provide both, suppliers and clients, with a reliable partner for a long-term business relationship and mutual benefit.

WHY JOIN US?

Rudolf Lietz Inc. recognizes how strong work performance makes the company successful.

One way to accomplish this is to offer a comprehensive benefit program designed to meet your basic and life-changing benefit needs. From full medical coverage to generous paid holidays and vacations. RLI's package is consistently and continually being assessed to ensure competitiveness.

Cultures and Values

Rudolf Lietz Inc. is a German-Filipino company located at Paranaque City, Philippines. Our culture follows that of similar German companies where we take pride on being organised, working to the book and executing high quality work. It is of utmost importance to stay not just one but several steps ahead of the competition but doing so through the quality of work. We also invite our team members to be creative with the work they do often working in smaller teams to solve much bigger problem.

Benefits

2020-10-26T02:56:48.293344+00:00 2020-12-29T16:00:00+00:00 20000 false manila-b-direct-philam-life-genesis-tan-unit The Philippine American Life and General Insurance Company, under the AIA Group of Companies, is an insurance company based in the Philippines. It is currently the largest life insurance company in the Philippines in terms of assets, net worth, investment and paid-up capital. Philam Life was founded in 1947 by Cornelius Vander Starr, the founder of AIG, and his partner Earl Carroll. Despite it being a relatively new player in the insurance in the Philippines, it quickly became the number one insurance company in the Philippines by 1949.

It has since received various awards such as the Asian Management Award for General Management, Asian Management Award for Financial Management, and the Reader’s Digest Platinum Trusted Brand Award. In addition, it also received the Presidential Citation from the Philippine government in 1994 for the company’s "invaluable contribution to nation-building and service to the country."​

Another milestone for the company was made in 1961 when the Philam Life Building in Ermita was inaugurated, which soon became a landmark structure as well as being a center of culture and the arts in Manila. The building would serve as its headquarters until 2013, when the company moved its headquarters to the Bonifacio Global City in Taguig.

Philam Life was part of the American International Group (AIG) until 2008 when the company, along with other AIG subsidiaries, American International Assurance (AIA) and ALICO were placed under the administration of a special purpose vehicle in exchange for a bailout by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.[7] On November 3, 2009, the American International Assurance (AIA Group) bought 99.78% stake of Philamlife after approval of government regulators.[8] On November 27, 2009, the new Philamlife bought a 51% stake in Ayala Life and formed a joint venture with the Bank of the Philippine Islands (BPI). Ayala Life was renamed BPI-Philam Life Assurance Corporation (BPI-Philam) in 2010.		 24103 Financial Services https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/GQBWHUZ5VSU75HPF687F-5a03dbd9.png Philam Life Genesis (Tan Unit) false true manila-b-direct-philam-life-genesis-tan-unit The Philippine American Life and General Insurance Company, under the AIA Group of Companies, is an insurance company based in the Philippines. It is currently the largest life insurance company in the Philippines in terms of assets, net worth, investment and paid-up capital. Philam Life was founded in 1947 by Cornelius Vander Starr, the founder of AIG, and his partner Earl Carroll. Despite it being a relatively new player in the insurance in the Philippines, it quickly became the number one insurance company in the Philippines by 1949.

It has since received various awards such as the Asian Management Award for General Management, Asian Management Award for Financial Management, and the Reader’s Digest Platinum Trusted Brand Award. In addition, it also received the Presidential Citation from the Philippine government in 1994 for the company’s "invaluable contribution to nation-building and service to the country."​

Another milestone for the company was made in 1961 when the Philam Life Building in Ermita was inaugurated, which soon became a landmark structure as well as being a center of culture and the arts in Manila. The building would serve as its headquarters until 2013, when the company moved its headquarters to the Bonifacio Global City in Taguig.

Philam Life was part of the American International Group (AIG) until 2008 when the company, along with other AIG subsidiaries, American International Assurance (AIA) and ALICO were placed under the administration of a special purpose vehicle in exchange for a bailout by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.[7] On November 3, 2009, the American International Assurance (AIA Group) bought 99.78% stake of Philamlife after approval of government regulators.[8] On November 27, 2009, the new Philamlife bought a 51% stake in Ayala Life and formed a joint venture with the Bank of the Philippine Islands (BPI). Ayala Life was renamed BPI-Philam Life Assurance Corporation (BPI-Philam) in 2010.		 false Financial Services false https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/C9GQG6K368LR7XY4PFWU-5a03dbd8.jpg https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/SGU74HN6BF5FHX88LRHK-5a03dbdc.jpg https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/WTEMRH3XLH5F5UYKGG2H-5a03dbdb.png https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/GQBWHUZ5VSU75HPF687F-5a03dbd9.png Philam Life Genesis (Tan Unit) http://www.philamlife.com Philam Life Genesis (Tan Unit) 2017-11-25T04:25:42.460679+00:00 <p>LEVERAGE on your existing network while building a business in Financial Advisory practice.</p>

2020-09-15T08:49:21.351163+00:00 2020-11-14T16:00:00+00:00 20000 false boutique-outsource-solutions-pty-ltd-philippine-branch History

Boutique Outsource Solutions Pty Ltd. – Philippine Branch (BOS) was established in 2014 in response to a need to provide a more personalized approach to the provision of outsource staff. It was set up by its parent company in Australia to specialize in servicing Australian-based finance-related companies who want to set up off-shore operations in the Philippines.

The extensive experience of BOS executive management team and support professionals in the fields of mortgage, process management and business process outsourcing is our edge against the other players in the industry as we are able to deliver a truly exceptional level of service that is made more unique because of our ability to tailor our solutions to our clients’ needs.

And because we offer flexible solutions, our business model is equally effective across a variety of businesses. We give our clients the liberty and the ability to focus on improving their business processes while BOS works to ensure we provide them with all the rest of their operational requirements.

Our Vision

Our vision is to attain sustainable and profitable growth by providing the best quality boutique solutions and services to our clients achieved through our people’s diverse talents and skills in an environment that fosters passion, excellence, honesty and lasting relationships while keeping in mind that work should always be fun and empowering.

Boutique Outsource Solutions Pty Ltd. – Philippine Branch (BOS) was established in 2014 in response to a need to provide a more personalized approach to the provision of outsource staff. It was set up by its parent company in Australia to specialize in servicing Australian-based finance-related companies who want to set up off-shore operations in the Philippines.

The extensive experience of BOS executive management team and support professionals in the fields of mortgage, process management and business process outsourcing is our edge against the other players in the industry as we are able to deliver a truly exceptional level of service that is made more unique because of our ability to tailor our solutions to our clients’ needs.

And because we offer flexible solutions, our business model is equally effective across a variety of businesses. We give our clients the liberty and the ability to focus on improving their business processes while BOS works to ensure we provide them with all the rest of their operational requirements.

Our Vision

Our vision is to attain sustainable and profitable growth by providing the best quality boutique solutions and services to our clients achieved through our people’s diverse talents and skills in an environment that fosters passion, excellence, honesty and lasting relationships while keeping in mind that work should always be fun and empowering.

2020-10-08T05:15:30.439827+00:00 2020-11-29T16:00:00+00:00 false pjlhullier The P.J. Lhuillier Group of Companies is composed of various companies ranging from its flagship business of pawn brokering to local and international remittance, micro-insurance, rural banking, hotel and restaurant management, jewelry and sports accessory retail, information technology, real estate, professional management, and corporate social responsibility.

History

Formally established in 1988, PJ Lhuillier,Inc. (PJLI) is a dynamic, multi-industry company that owns and operates businesses dealing with pawnshop, non-pawnshop financial services (banking, international and local remittance, non-life insurance, electronic loading, bills payment, and collection service), retail (jewelry and health and wellness products), hotel and restaurant management, information technology management, sports, and real estate/property management.

It is the proud parent company of Cebuana Lhuillier, one of the leading and largest non-bank financial services providers in the Philippines with over 1,700 branches nationwide. PJLI attributes its dominance in the industry to integrity and heartfelt service, its robust network of local and international industry partners, and its steadfast commitment to nurture market-leading businesses for its growing clientele.

Today, the P.J. Lhuillier Group of Companies seeks to become the best and preferred microfinancial and business-to-business solutions partner. The company intends to fulfil this vision through rendering dedication, hard work, and service.


Company Mission
To enable more Filipinos to have access to financial solutions.

Company Vision
To be the best and preferred microfinancial and business-to-business solutions partner with a heart.		 612 Financial Services https://s3-ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/kalibrr-company-assets/logos/XKCX4AJ5TVJ78U77KKS2-5852042a.jpg PJ Lhuillier Group of Companies true true pjlhullier The P.J. Lhuillier Group of Companies is composed of various companies ranging from its flagship business of pawn brokering to local and international remittance, micro-insurance, rural banking, hotel and restaurant management, jewelry and sports accessory retail, information technology, real estate, professional management, and corporate social responsibility.

History

Formally established in 1988, PJ Lhuillier,Inc. (PJLI) is a dynamic, multi-industry company that owns and operates businesses dealing with pawnshop, non-pawnshop financial services (banking, international and local remittance, non-life insurance, electronic loading, bills payment, and collection service), retail (jewelry and health and wellness products), hotel and restaurant management, information technology management, sports, and real estate/property management.

It is the proud parent company of Cebuana Lhuillier, one of the leading and largest non-bank financial services providers in the Philippines with over 1,700 branches nationwide. PJLI attributes its dominance in the industry to integrity and heartfelt service, its robust network of local and international industry partners, and its steadfast commitment to nurture market-leading businesses for its growing clientele.

Today, the P.J. Lhuillier Group of Companies seeks to become the best and preferred microfinancial and business-to-business solutions partner. The company intends to fulfil this vision through rendering dedication, hard work, and service.


Company Mission
To enable more Filipinos to have access to financial solutions.

<p>Understands &amp; analyzes business problems and needs; Translates, captures and documents requirements, providing high level solutions that leverage product capabilities and best practices in order to produce optimal technology solutions.</p>

<p>Key responsibilities</p>

<ul>
<li>Analyzes and documents business and technical requirements that best reflect customer needs; Translates the requirements into prioritize epics/features, supporting the release and iteration planning.</li>
<li>Advises customers based on product capabilities and best practices, leveraging reuse and ensuring high business value</li>
<li>Provides and designs, based on pre-defined solution architecture, an integrated high-level solution that fit customer's business &amp; operational needs.</li>
<li>Effectively participates in and/or leads formal and informal reviews with stakeholders, applying knowledge and experience and providing technical perspective and support; Performs demonstrations of solutions to users.</li>
<li>Support development teams during the iterations (provide business clarifications, adjustment to risks, change in scope, reprioritize and approve “done” stories and features during demo’s).</li>
<li>Responsible for communicating the solution to customers' business and/ or IT personnel, explaining the details of new solutions and their impact on business processes and ensuring that the customer understands the solution.</li>
<li>Follows up on solution design issues in his/her domain until solution is signed off and supports the resolution of configuration/ implementation-related issues if and when they arise (for example, overseeing ordering processes across various customer types and products, leading all product catalogue models and designs, etc.).</li>
<li>Prepares solution-related documents and specifications; May also configure the solution, and create, execute and maintain test plans when applicable.</li>
<li>Identifies product gaps and recommends enhancements to the product core team</li>
</ul>		 550 false 2020-11-09T08:22:43.198340+00:00 IT and Software Taguig Philippines Metro Manila 121959 false false Business Analyst 1 1 <ul>

2020-11-06T03:19:46.232023+00:00 2020-12-30T16:00:00+00:00 15000 false imprexis-incorporated IMPREXIS TELIVUS TERRANET INC.

Imprexis Telivus Terranet INC. is a startup company servicing clients in different parts of the world,
Imprexis, specializes in BPO services, recruitment and consultancy.

We deliver a suite of wide-ranging solutions and world-class customer service. Its focus is on
the core of its people and provides services that are like no other—an excellent standard of
solutions developed for its clients and partners. Its core offering is BPO Services, an outbound
call center. It is a type of call center wherein account manager call potential and existing
customers to fulfill the set goals of a client. The usual goals that an account manager must meet
are making a sale, promoting a product or service, and gathering leads. To measure the
success of its account manager in meeting these goals, a BPO company uses Key Performance
Indicators (KPIs) such as sales conversion rate, calls per agent, and first call close.

Imprexis Telivus Terranet INC., believes that the right partnerships enable smart solutions and added
values. Therefore, we ensure that we have the industry knowledge, and the competent
management to fulfill our clients’ needs and exceed their expectations. We deliver expert
solutions to our clients so that they can focus on their main business and benefit from increased
efficiencies and improved costs.

This continuous success in providing services in different parts of the world inspired the creation
of Imprexis Telivus Terranet INC. 		26750 Business Process Outsourcing https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/www.kalibrr.com/logos/GEB6WRKSTRLVY8R33BFPMMP9CHEP67Q73S9JMNBC-5f7456af.png Imprexis Incorporated true true imprexis-incorporated IMPREXIS TELIVUS TERRANET INC.

The Project Manager will play a vital role in planning and organizing fit out projects in Metro Manila and all around the Philippines. The role also takes the lead in managing the implementation of construction projects from initial sketch through punch-listing and post-project evaluation.</p>

<p>- Designing and planning spaces for construction</p>

<p>- Overseeing fitout projects from beginning to end</p>

<p>- Managing budgets and estimating construction costs</p>

<p>- Determining necessary equipment, materials, and manpower needed for each project</p>

<p>- Preparing reports regarding job status</p>

<p>- Resolving any problems that may arise during construction</p>

<p>- Ensuring compliance with safety regulations and building codes</p>

<p>- Ensuring all deadlines are met</p>

<ul>
<li>BS in Computer Science, Information Science, or equivalent.</li>
<li>Candidate should have relevant work experience in software development and security analysis.</li>
</ul>

<p>The candidate should demonstrate knowledge in the following areas:</p>

<ul>
<li>Appreciable knowledge of techniques and standards surrounding secure coding practices, threat intelligence, and countermeasures.</li>
<li>Candidates should be familiar with the system building experience about preventing vulnerability or know-how to prevent known attacks such as XSS, SQL injection, etc.</li>
<li>Software development experience in one or more of the following core languages: Java, Javascript, Bash, PHP, Python or equivalent.</li>
<li>Adequate knowledge of web related technologies (Web applications, Web Services, Web Architectures) and of network/web related protocols.</li>
<li>Strong interest in various aspects of security research and development.</li>
<li>Strong understanding of security vulnerabilities and the impact that they can have on information systems and response methodologies.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Preferences:</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>Success in this role requires excellent oral and writing skills, project management, strong people skills, and a results-oriented attitude.</li>
<li>In all endeavors, the incumbent must demonstrate the highest degree of ethics and professionalism.</li>
<li>Possess excellent analytical and technical problem-solving skills.</li>
<li>Be able to make decisions independently and in a self-directed manner in support of the goals of the team and organization.</li>
<li>Ability to work in a team environment with other team members with variety of skills.</li>
</ul>		 96.22641509433963 PHP month false software-engineer-for-security-analysis-3 Full time public 300 paid_leave mat_pat_leave 2020-02-07T02:36:08.911501+00:00 150368 2015-03-28T20:46:06.245781+00:00 false 608 PHP 2015-05-03T18:31:43.555932+00:00 608 2020-02-07T02:36:08.911501+00:00 150368 2015-03-28T20:46:06.245781+00:00 false 614 Java 2015-05-03T18:31:43.555932+00:00 614 2020-02-07T02:36:08.911501+00:00 150368 2015-05-22T02:25:40.302112+00:00 false 1301 Network Security 2016-06-30T02:20:01.343690+00:00 1301

IMPACT Training & Consultancy is a company committed to the advancement and excellence of its multi-national clients across several industries. Why Join Us?

DISCOVER UNLIMITED JOB POSSIBILITIES

CONVENIENCE One Stop Shop - One Day Hiring

Get Hired in One (1) day. Don't waste hours going to different call centers and waiting a few more hours in long lines only to find out that you are not qualified or the job you are interested is not available. After you arrive in ACES CALL CENTER JOBS, you will be processed within 30 minutes and know your possible options on where you are qualified.

Since 2011, over 10,000+ jobseekers found their job through ACES!

CHOICES Comprehensive Active Jobs

Choose from the 20+ Top Call Centers, 150+ locations, 800+ positions, 10,000+ vacancies. There is a perfect job for you in ACES. In ACES, we only endorse you to clients that you have the highest chance of getting hired. Come during our ACES Days and get Hired On The Spot (HOTS)

Since 2011, ACES has consistently been awarded as the Top 3 Recruitment Partner of choice of the Biggest BPOs and Call Centers.

CHARGES It is FREE to apply and ACES gives you 3,000.00 Gift Check to qualified hires.

It is FREE to apply with us. ACES Call Center Jobs is the only company in the Philippines that gives an extra Php 3,000.00 SODEXO Gift Checks to its successful hires. This is on top of the incentives that you get from the call centers and is given by ACES.

Since 2011, ACES has given over 30,000,000.00 (Thirty million) worth of SODEXO Gift Checks to thousands of jobseekers hired through ACES.

2020-11-05T04:00:58.279565+00:00 2020-11-29T16:00:00+00:00 false cobena-business-analytics-strategy-inc Cobena is a data analytics company founded back in 2016 by seven executives who shared a common dream: to bring data sciences into the Philippines and help create a “third leg” to the Philippine economy, after our OFWs and BPOs. The dream was simple; in a country with an abundant supply of intelligent technical graduates who were equally creative and articulate, there lay the opportunity to supply the world with data scientists: unicorns who could help make businesses smarter with data-driven decision making.

Fast forward, three years later, Cobena is now at the forefront of the data sciences industry in the Philippines, and in 2018 was recognized by APAC CIO magazine to be among the Top 10 Business Intelligence Providers in the Asia Pacific. And, beginning this year, APAC Business Insights recognized Cobena to be among Asia Pacific’s Fastest Growing Data analytics companies. Both publications are based in Silicon Valley.

In its brief history, Cobena has had over 100 projects across the Philippines, South East Asia, Hong Kong, and Japan. Among its top clients are Multinationals like Nestle, Unilever, and Johnson & Johnson, and some of the country’s top conglomerates like Ayala, San Miguel, Globe, JG Summit, and Metrobank. Cobena has offices in the Philippines and Singapore.

Beyond its roster of top clients, Cobena is extremely proud of its 40 Data Scientists and Business analysts, who hold top honors and master’s degrees from the country’s premier universities. Where other companies still struggle to find the magic formula when it comes to succeeding with millennials, Cobena seems to have found just what it takes to breed and keep the country’s top talent. Cobena in August 2020, became part of Demand Sciences, a business intelligence platform based in Boston Massachusetts.

The dream was simple; in a country with an abundant supply of intelligent technical graduates who were equally creative and articulate, there lay the opportunity to supply the world with data scientists: unicorns who could help make businesses smarter with data-driven decision making.

Fast forward, three years later, Cobena is now at the forefront of the data sciences industry in the Philippines, and in 2018 was recognized by APAC CIO magazine to be among the Top 10 Business Intelligence Providers in the Asia Pacific. And, beginning this year, APAC Business Insights recognized Cobena to be among Asia Pacific’s Fastest Growing Data analytics companies. Both publications are based in Silicon Valley.

In its brief history, Cobena has had over 100 projects across the Philippines, South East Asia, Hong Kong, and Japan. Among its top clients are Multinationals like Nestle, Unilever, and Johnson & Johnson, and some of the country’s top conglomerates like Ayala, San Miguel, Globe, JG Summit, and Metrobank. Cobena has offices in the Philippines and Singapore.

Beyond its roster of top clients, Cobena is extremely proud of its 40 Data Scientists and Business analysts, who hold top honors and master’s degrees from the country’s premier universities. Where other companies still struggle to find the magic formula when it comes to succeeding with millennials, Cobena seems to have found just what it takes to breed and keep the country’s top talent. Cobena in August 2020, became part of Demand Sciences, a business intelligence platform based in Boston Massachusetts.

2020-10-22T05:01:11.560656+00:00 2020-12-16T16:00:00+00:00 60000 false ready-group-global Ready Group Global delivers IT Enterprise Architecture for Accounting Firms through the provision of projects, services and products. Specialising in data security, workflow efficiency, new generation applications and multi location workforce requirements.

We're different to other companies in the following ways:

- We’re not a BPO. You’re more than just a number.
- Our PH team are equal with onshore team. We’re not an ‘outsourced team’ that is managed remotely.
- You report directly to the company and not the BPO itself.
- You'll be included in the company strategy and get international business experience.
- You’re not just a "number"
- We’re a small team and have a more ‘tight knit’ culture.		 23961 IT and Software https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/MVTFAJUHWV7STZS84FQXGGJ4KPF6TQ4K9GA9J8LV-5bf63a54.png Ready Group Global true true ready-group-global Ready Group Global delivers IT Enterprise Architecture for Accounting Firms through the provision of projects, services and products. 2020-09-15T07:16:17.469534+00:00 2020-12-30T16:00:00+00:00 40000 false fast-retailing-inc-uniqlo UNIQLO LifeWear

Apparel that comes from the Japanese values of simplicity, quality and longevity. Designed to be of the time and for the time, LifeWear is made with such modern elegance that it becomes the building blocks of each individual’s style. A perfect shirt that is always being made more perfect. The simplest design hiding the most thoughtful and modern details. The best in fit and fabric made to be affordable and accessible to all. LifeWear is clothing that is constantly being innovated, bringing more warmth, more lightness, better design, and better comfort to people’s lives.

UNIQLO and Fast Retailing

UNIQLO is a brand of Fast Retailing Co., Ltd., a leading global Japanese retail holding company that designs, manufactures and sells clothing under seven main brands: Comptoir des Cotonniers, GU, Helmut Lang, J Brand, Princesse tam.tam, Theory, and UNIQLO. With global sales of approximately 1.8619 trillion yen for the 2017 fiscal year ending August 31, 2017 (US $16.87 billion, calculated in yen using the end of August 2017 rate of $1 = 110.4 yen), Fast Retailing is one of the world’s largest apparel retail companies, and UNIQLO is Japan’s leading specialty retailer.

UNIQLO continues to open large-scale stores in some of the world's most important cities and locations, as part of its ongoing efforts to solidify its status as a truly global brand. Today the company has more than 1,900 stores in 19 markets worldwide including Japan, Australia, Belgium, Canada, China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Malaysia, Philippines, Russia, Singapore, South Korea, Spain, Taiwan, Thailand, U.K. and the U.S. In addition, Grameen UNIQLO, a social business established in Bangladesh in September 2010, currently operates several Grameen UNIQLO stores in Dhaka. UNIQLO manages an integrated business model under which it designs, manufactures, markets and sells high-quality, casual apparel. The company believes that truly great clothes should be supremely comfortable, feature universal designs, are of high quality and offer a superb fit to everyone who wears them.

With a corporate statement committed to changing clothes, changing conventional wisdom and change the world, Fast Retailing is dedicated to creating great clothing with new and unique value to enrich the lives of people everywhere. For more information about UNIQLO and Fast Retailing, please visit www.uniqlo.com and www.fastretailing.com.		 9668 Retail Industry https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/EXQFZEE2LX2Q7XMG2S8LTGXT25ANS6QCXW377JDW-5a5c5850.png Fast Retailing Philippines, Inc. (UNIQLO) true true fast-retailing-inc-uniqlo UNIQLO LifeWear

Apparel that comes from the Japanese values of simplicity, quality and longevity. Designed to be of the time and for the time, LifeWear is made with such modern elegance that it becomes the building blocks of each individual’s style. A perfect shirt that is always being made more perfect. The simplest design hiding the most thoughtful and modern details. The best in fit and fabric made to be affordable and accessible to all. LifeWear is clothing that is constantly being innovated, bringing more warmth, more lightness, better design, and better comfort to people’s lives.

UNIQLO and Fast Retailing

UNIQLO is a brand of Fast Retailing Co., Ltd., a leading global Japanese retail holding company that designs, manufactures and sells clothing under seven main brands: Comptoir des Cotonniers, GU, Helmut Lang, J Brand, Princesse tam.tam, Theory, and UNIQLO. With global sales of approximately 1.8619 trillion yen for the 2017 fiscal year ending August 31, 2017 (US $16.87 billion, calculated in yen using the end of August 2017 rate of $1 = 110.4 yen), Fast Retailing is one of the world’s largest apparel retail companies, and UNIQLO is Japan’s leading specialty retailer.

UNIQLO continues to open large-scale stores in some of the world's most important cities and locations, as part of its ongoing efforts to solidify its status as a truly global brand. Today the company has more than 1,900 stores in 19 markets worldwide including Japan, Australia, Belgium, Canada, China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Malaysia, Philippines, Russia, Singapore, South Korea, Spain, Taiwan, Thailand, U.K. and the U.S. In addition, Grameen UNIQLO, a social business established in Bangladesh in September 2010, currently operates several Grameen UNIQLO stores in Dhaka. UNIQLO manages an integrated business model under which it designs, manufactures, markets and sells high-quality, casual apparel. The company believes that truly great clothes should be supremely comfortable, feature universal designs, are of high quality and offer a superb fit to everyone who wears them.

With a corporate statement committed to changing clothes, changing conventional wisdom and change the world, Fast Retailing is dedicated to creating great clothing with new and unique value to enrich the lives of people everywhere. - Pharmaceutical active ingredients
- Excipients and auxiliaries
- Food ingredients and raw materials
- Feed ingredients and veterinary raw materials
- Cosmetic raw materials
- Commodities
- Industrial chemicals

Our Headquarters are located in Parañaque City, Metro Manila, Philippines. The Representative Office is situated in Ho Chi Minh City (Saigon), Vietnam.

History

Our years of first-hand frontline experience in the marketplace, know-how in sourcing from manufacturers and traders world-wide, and European Management with Oriental Expertise provide both, suppliers and clients, with a reliable partner for a long-term business relationship and mutual benefit.

WHY JOIN US?

Rudolf Lietz Inc. recognizes how strong work performance makes the company successful.

One way to accomplish this is to offer a comprehensive benefit program designed to meet your basic and life-changing benefit needs. From full medical coverage to generous paid holidays and vacations. RLI's package is consistently and continually being assessed to ensure competitiveness.

Cultures and Values

Rudolf Lietz Inc. is a German-Filipino company located at Paranaque City, Philippines. Our culture follows that of similar German companies where we take pride on being organised, working to the book and executing high quality work. It is of utmost importance to stay not just one but several steps ahead of the competition but doing so through the quality of work. We also invite our team members to be creative with the work they do often working in smaller teams to solve much bigger problem.

Benefits

2020-11-09T03:24:18.347886+00:00 2020-11-19T16:00:00+00:00 false ramesh-trading-corporation-1 RAMESH TRADING was founded in 1948 as a General Merchandise Store and as the years went by became an importer, distributor, and wholesaler of general merchandise.

In 2006, Ramesh Trading changed its business type to Corporation as part of its efforts to improve itself in the new millennium coupled with the entry of the 3rd Generation now handling the business. After over 70 years of its existence, the company has successfully branched out its endeavors into importing, wholesaling and distributorship. In 2014, the Corporation moved to a bigger facility located in Pasay City which is in line with its expansion efforts. This will further improve the company's overall efficiency and effectiveness ratings and speed up its operations.

With the company's vision of supplying every room in every household in the Philippines, we continue to deliver quality goods and services to our customers. We have branched out with our professional line of products and have also been supplying Hotels, Restaurants, Caterers, Cafes and Culinary Schools with our Industrial Grade products.

In 2006, Ramesh Trading changed its business type to Corporation as part of its efforts to improve itself in the new millennium coupled with the entry of the 3rd Generation now handling the business. After over 70 years of its existence, the company has successfully branched out its endeavors into importing, wholesaling and distributorship. In 2014, the Corporation moved to a bigger facility located in Pasay City which is in line with its expansion efforts. This will further improve the company's overall efficiency and effectiveness ratings and speed up its operations.

With the company's vision of supplying every room in every household in the Philippines, we continue to deliver quality goods and services to our customers. 2020-11-09T03:30:07.777436+00:00 2020-11-09T16:00:00+00:00 false ramesh-trading-corporation-1 RAMESH TRADING was founded in 1948 as a General Merchandise Store and as the years went by became an importer, distributor, and wholesaler of general merchandise.

In 2006, Ramesh Trading changed its business type to Corporation as part of its efforts to improve itself in the new millennium coupled with the entry of the 3rd Generation now handling the business. After over 70 years of its existence, the company has successfully branched out its endeavors into importing, wholesaling and distributorship. In 2014, the Corporation moved to a bigger facility located in Pasay City which is in line with its expansion efforts. This will further improve the company's overall efficiency and effectiveness ratings and speed up its operations.

With the company's vision of supplying every room in every household in the Philippines, we continue to deliver quality goods and services to our customers. We have branched out with our professional line of products and have also been supplying Hotels, Restaurants, Caterers, Cafes and Culinary Schools with our Industrial Grade products.

</ul>

<p><strong>What we offer: </strong><br>
A dynamic atmosphere where you are surrounded by the best in the industry and where you can grow your skillset and experience. Amongst us, you will experience a culture built on trust and responsibility while having a lot of fun at work. We offer you the possibility to either continue or start your MDM journey together with us. Plus, great company perks and benefits such as:</p>

<li>New Office with a cool atmosphere inspired by the main office in Sweden</li>
<li>The company follows Philippine holidays both Regular and Special</li>

<li>Company and Family Oriented events all year-round</li>
<li>Opportunities to travel to Sweden</li>
<li>Opportunities to travel outside the Philippines for certification or conferences</li>
<li>Free coffee, fruits, and lunch</li>
<li>Birthday Gift for Employees</li>
<li>HMO on the first day of employment with one (1) free dependent</li>
<li>Group Life Insurance</li>
<li>Flexible work schedule</li>

<li>Career Guidance in terms of roles - personal and individual development plan</li>
</ul>

2020-11-06T06:08:06.609760+00:00 2021-11-06T06:08:06.609760+00:00 false public-safety-mutual-benefit-fund-inc- The Public Safety Mutual Benefit Fund, Inc. (PSMBFI) is a duly registered non-stock, non-profit mutual benefit fund association, organized to provide insurance protection, and financial and material aid to its members.

PSMBFI is committed to provide life insurance coverage for public safety practitioners, both uniformed and civilian. With minimal requirements, PSMBFI immediately releases the cash advance to the beneficiaries to help pay for the member's funeral and burial expenses. Once all the requirements are completed, the full amount of insurance claims is immediately processed.

The association endeavors to continuously improve the benefits given and services rendered to its members. Furthermore, it remains steadfast in its commitment to fulfill its Corporate Social Responsibility Programs to its constituents.

As a financial institution, PSMBFI implements financial literacy programs to educate members from different public safety agencies nationwide.

The association has a strong membership base composed of the uniformed and civilian personnel from the following agencies/institutions:
* Philippine National Police
* National Police Commission
* Bureau of Fire Protection
* DOTC- Office of Transportation Security
* Philippine National Police Academy
* Philippine Coast Guard
* National Mapping and Resource

Authority (MMDA)

2020-11-09T03:14:45.735309+00:00 2020-11-09T16:00:00+00:00 false ramesh-trading-corporation-1 RAMESH TRADING was founded in 1948 as a General Merchandise Store and as the years went by became an importer, distributor, and wholesaler of general merchandise.

In 2006, Ramesh Trading changed its business type to Corporation as part of its efforts to improve itself in the new millennium coupled with the entry of the 3rd Generation now handling the business. After over 70 years of its existence, the company has successfully branched out its endeavors into importing, wholesaling and distributorship. In 2014, the Corporation moved to a bigger facility located in Pasay City which is in line with its expansion efforts. This will further improve the company's overall efficiency and effectiveness ratings and speed up its operations.

With the company's vision of supplying every room in every household in the Philippines, we continue to deliver quality goods and services to our customers. We have branched out with our professional line of products and have also been supplying Hotels, Restaurants, Caterers, Cafes and Culinary Schools with our Industrial Grade products.

1. 8-10 years experience on IT and/or Telco industry<br>
2. At least 8 years experience in designing, implementing and leading successful technology or product-oriented business solutions focused on optimizing business value and process, and business applications and platforms; Management Consulting, BPR, or equivalent<br>
3. At least 5 years experience in managing and coordination with vendors and/or solution providers to deliver IT or Business solutions<br>
4. At least 5 years experience in doing client facing roles</p>

<p>Level of Knowledge:<br>
1.Good skills and knowledge of servant leadership, facilitation, situational awareness, conflict resolution, continual improvement, empowerment, and increasing transparency<br>
2. Knowledgeable of Technology Product and Software Development Lifecycles<br>
3. Knowledgeable on Agile Methodology and/or Design Sprint<br>
4. Knowledge on project management principles and discipline<br>
5. Basic knowledge on the telco business and background processes</p>

<p>Competencies:<br>
1. Building Relations: Responds to others in a positive manner; Supports and engages with others; Has a proactive collaborative approach; Establishes a collaborative culture<br>
2. Entrepreneurial orientation: Addresses current opportunities and problems; Demonstrates creativity &amp; initiative; Works independently &amp; makes creative decisions<br>
3. Customer orientation: Has a customer perspective on issues &amp; projects a positive manner with customers; Creates meaningful customer relationships; Promotes team culture of exemplary customer relationships <br>
4. Persuasive communication: Successfully engages in communicating with others: Effectively adapts message for maximum impact : Uses various techniques to get buy in <br>
5. Results orientation: Achieves all set tasks; Delivers consistently <br>
6. Fostering teamwork : Cooperates and is a good team member; Sets positive team expectations and shows respect; Values and solicits input to promote team cooperation; Encourages and empowers others<br>
7. Problem solving: Breaks down problems and identifies tasks and activities needed; Sees basic relationships; Sees multiple relationships<br>

<p>The nature of the chief executive’s scope is inherently broad; consequently, the special assistant must be a generalist— able to ASSIST in a broad range of areas.</p>

<p>Successful special assistants can Quickly Study and acclimate to new areas of operation. The chief executive might be preparing reports or a talk on accounting and payroll, for example, and the assistant must assist the office of the chief executive by collating sources for the talk or presentation— this is just an example.</p>

<p>Another example might be that the chief executive might be involved in a project that requires processing big data— perhaps thousands of profiles of prospective team members for a new office—; this consequently might call for a simple bot or some macros to be coded; special assistants are trained to assist in some of the more rote coding— in this example.</p>

<p> </p>

<p> </p>

<p><strong>Social Interface </strong></p>

<p>As one of the social interfaces of this chief executive you will play several roles and functions including but not limited to being the chief executive’s Ambassador, being an Explorer or being an Investigator, or simply being a basic Representative. These roles are each definitively unique and trained on internally at our offices.</p>

<p><strong>Technical Assistant </strong></p>

<ul>
<li>Simple Data Encoding</li>
<li>Programming and Coding
<ul>
<li>Configuring ingrations (managed services)</li>
<li>Interface applications via APIs</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Hardware
<ul>
<li>Assembling workstations (mostly Windows 10 workstations; some Linux)</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

<p><em>===</em></p>

<p><em>Remember that you do not have to have any stock knowledge on any of these topics; remember that the only requirement here is aptitude, some potential, an open mind, and most importantly, the willingness and conviction to challenge yourself to learn new things at a faster and faster rate, at the start of every new week! </em></p>

<p><em>===</em></p>

<p><strong>Mechanical Assistant </strong></p>

<ul>
<li>Wood-working</li>
<li>Light electrical work around the office (lights, light switches)</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Digital Media Assistant</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>Photography and videography; film editing; social media content</li>
<li>Creative writing: fiction, historical fiction, essays</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Executive Assistant </strong></p>

<ul>
<li>Business writing</li>
<li>Scheduling appointments</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Personal Assistant </strong></p>

<ul>
<li>House staff management and training</li>
<li>Errands</li>
</ul>

<p> </p>		 550 false 2020-11-09T08:01:39.579642+00:00 Management and Consultancy Makati Philippines Metro Manila 163663 false false Special Assistant to Chief Executive 549 flexitime food perf_bonus 1 <p><em>Due to these minimum requirements being so qualitative, the interviews and hands-on tests in these areas are quite extensive and ultra-dimensional. </em></p>

<p><strong>Soft Skills Core that can be developed</strong></p>

<ul>
<li><strong>Verbal communication </strong></li>
<li><strong>Written communication </strong></li>
<li><strong>Interpersonal skills</strong></li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Technical Aptitude that can be developed</strong></p>

<p>Example test topics include:</p>

<ul>
<li><strong>Workstation assembly</strong> (mostly Windows 10; Linux and other operating systems may be brought up during the interview); BIOS configurations.</li>
<li>Software: Macros, Visual Basic, C++</li>
<li>Managed Services: APIs, Webhooks</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Cultural Compatibility </strong></p>

<ul>
<li>Science and Academia</li>
<li>Trade and Industry</li>
<li>Contemporary Arts</li>
</ul>

<p> </p>

<p>---</p>

<p>From day to day your assigned areas will vary drastically. For example, you literally might assist the chief executive on a woodworking task, then some low-level software programming, then at the day’s end, attend a business development exploratory meeting with the executive. Due to the broad range in activities, we test for aptitude and potential, not stock knowledge. Remember, though, we are not hiring carpenters and software engineers, we are hiring people that can be trained on-the-job. Bolloré Transport & Logistics brings together four traditional businesses of the Bolloré Group. Bolloré Ports, Bolloré Logistics, Bolloré Railways and Bolloré Energy are four areas of business and expertise that now work together to satisfy our global clients. Bolloré Transport & Logistics makes all of its areas of expertise available to its clients, including construction and operation of port terminals and railway lines, freight forwarding and Oil logistics, based on the expertise of 36,000 employees in 105 countries.
