Constantly adapting to its customers’ changing needs, the company has enriched its expertise to become a tier-one supply chain partner and one of the top 10 transport and logistics companies in the world with the largest integrated logistics network in Africa.​ Bolloré Logistics delivers custom-fit solutions with a high added value that draw on an in-depth experience and understanding of different industries, as well as the constant quest for improvement and optimisation that is central to the company’s own culture and values.

Bolloré Transport & Logistics brings together four traditional businesses of the Bolloré Group. Bolloré Ports, Bolloré Logistics, Bolloré Railways and Bolloré Energy are four areas of business and expertise that now work together to satisfy our global clients. Bolloré Transport & Logistics makes all of its areas of expertise available to its clients, including construction and operation of port terminals and railway lines, freight forwarding and Oil logistics, based on the expertise of 36,000 employees in 105 countries.

Bolloré Logistics matches the needs of import and export companies around the world, providing complex supply chain management solutions for major groups and international shipment services for SMEs. Its global offer is built around its comprehensive and integrated expertise in five services:

– Multimodal Transport
– Customs and Regulatory Compliance
– Logistics
– Global Supply Chain

<p><br>
As a Lead-in-training, the offshore Recruitment Specialist Level III functions as a one-man team in a high-volume, online-based, centralized recruiting environment. The position combines full-cycle recruitment, account management, and client support responsibilities.</p>

<p><strong>Responsibilities</strong></p>

<p><br>
➢ Partner with Sales and Account Managers to grow Amtec&amp;#39;s contract staffing business in the US.<br>
- Plan and execute sourcing strategies.<br>
- Prepare screening questions based on client requirements and job definition.<br>
- Perform candidate phone interviews and other types of preliminary qualification process to identify top talent.<br>
- Present qualified applicants to hiring managers and schedule interviews as requested.<br>
- Initiate job offers and assist candidates with Amtec&amp;#39;s onboarding and hiring procedures.<br>
- Terminate contractors when they fail to meet client standards or upon completion of the assignment.<br>
- Create an amazing candidate experience for all applicants.<br>
- Participate in strategic staffing initiatives including workflow and process improvement.<br>
- Share best practices among team members to support growth and continuous improvement.</p>

<p>➢ Coordinate with clients to understand recruitment needs and place the best available talent in the market.<br>
➢ Utilize applicant tracking software to record all recruitment-related activities.<br>
➢ Develop and maintain strong consultative relationships with candidates and client companies.<br>
➢ The Recruitment Specialist may, likewise, be asked to perform related duties and/or assist in other functions or projects incidental to the work described herein.</p>

<li>P30,000 to P37,000 base salary (depends on relevant experience)</li>

After over 70 years of its existence, the company has successfully branched out its endeavors into importing, wholesaling and distributorship. In 2014, the Corporation moved to a bigger facility located in Pasay City which is in line with its expansion efforts. 2020-11-09T03:36:49.100343+00:00 2021-03-30T16:00:00+00:00 false sky-cable-corporation ABOUT SKY

SKY Cable Corporation is the pay television and broadband arm of ABS-CBN, the Philippines’ leading media and entertainment company.

Since introducing cable television to Filipinos in 1990, it has become a frontrunner in pay TV and broadband services that offer rich content that entertain, educate, inspire, and offer experiences to Filipinos, whom it considers as its Kapamilyas.

Today, it serves Filipinos through various products under SKYdirect, SKY Fiber, and SKYcable.

SKYcable is a Pay TV service offering HD cable TV with top-notch programming and the widest selection of channels on offer by any cable provider; and SKY Fiber, a high-speed broadband for the home and beyond.

SKYdirect, now in over one million homes nationwide, brings SKY’s superior brand of cable entertainment options to more areas, beyond the urban centers via direct-to-home television technology.

SKY serves the business community through SKYBIZ, Its corporate and commercial arm, which delivers content (SKYcable) and connectivity (SKY Fiber) services to any business of any size.		 17061 Cable and Telecommunications https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/www.kalibrr.com/logos/YRBMYTQF3DTVF5CA8X8H3R9YA46P7R77P2BYHV97-5e4e207b.png Sky Cable Corporation false true sky-cable-corporation ABOUT SKY

He/she needs to work closely with key stakeholders to define the testing activities and scope needed on the project/release.</p>

<p>A Test Analyst may oversee a team and serve as subject matter expert for the said team. He/she most of the time assumes the Test Lead role in a project / release.</p>

<p><strong><em>Responsibilities:</em></strong></p>

<p><strong>Testing Activities (Test Design and Execution)</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>Reviews and provide feedback to requirements reviews/discussions</li>
<li>Develops a test plan that leads to effective testing with optimal test coverage, based on the deep understanding of the business domain and/or project/release/component.</li>
<li>Design efficient and effective test scenarios and cases, based on the in-depth understanding of the business domain and application functionalities and features.</li>
<li>Considers testability when reviewing the designs which result in more testable features and better test coverage.</li>
<li>Applies knowledge of software development process for early discovery of defects and higher quality builds</li>
<li>Performs actual test execution and analyze test results of highly complex programs/projects/releases.</li>
<li>Facilitates the discovery of potential issues through the application of appropriate testing methodologies.</li>
<li>Analyzes patterns of defects to identify test holes for a feature area.</li>
<li>Develops and documents quality risks and mitigations.</li>
<li>Develops new documentation and project testing/quality procedures.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Test Coordination and Guidance</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>Be an advocate for quality.</li>
<li>Provides leadership, guidance and direction to less experienced testers / users in resolution of escalated issues and/or complex production, application or system problems.</li>
<li>Drives the project test team to test effectively and efficiently to meet quality standards and deadlines.</li>
<li>Helps resolve issues/remove roadblocks for the project test team and/or escalate accordingly.</li>
<li>Provides regular quality status updates to IT testing lead and/or project stakeholders</li>
<li>Ensures efficient and effective delivery of service; Recommends and implement process improvements</li>
</ul>		 550 false 2020-11-09T09:46:06.652242+00:00 IT and Software Quezon City Philippines Metro Manila 152117 false false Test Automation Analyst | Manager Level 3 1 <ul>

2020-11-09T03:38:27.260166+00:00 2020-11-14T16:00:00+00:00 false ramesh-trading-corporation-1 RAMESH TRADING was founded in 1948 as a General Merchandise Store and as the years went by became an importer, distributor, and wholesaler of general merchandise.

In 2006, Ramesh Trading changed its business type to Corporation as part of its efforts to improve itself in the new millennium coupled with the entry of the 3rd Generation now handling the business. After over 70 years of its existence, the company has successfully branched out its endeavors into importing, wholesaling and distributorship. In 2014, the Corporation moved to a bigger facility located in Pasay City which is in line with its expansion efforts. This will further improve the company's overall efficiency and effectiveness ratings and speed up its operations.

With the company's vision of supplying every room in every household in the Philippines, we continue to deliver quality goods and services to our customers. We have branched out with our professional line of products and have also been supplying Hotels, Restaurants, Caterers, Cafes and Culinary Schools with our Industrial Grade products.

2020-11-02T14:56:27.258997+00:00 2021-10-30T16:00:00+00:00 false costuless A DTI, IPO, SEC REGISTERED & CERTIFIED COMPANY

As a leader in the Commercial Furniture and Business Furniture & Interiors market we have assembled what we believe to be a terrific collection of excellent, high quality furniture solutions designed specifically for today's environment.

Cost U less Group established in 2007 is a professionally managed Business with a proven and credible track record having delivered various projects and its products and services across the Philippine’s leading Architects, Interior Designers and Project Managers, Top 5000 Companies and Small to Medium institutions, Schools, Churches and Government agencies. Our skill is transforming their ideas into designs with a truly satisfying customer and client experience.

Our Products have been manufactured through stringent processes in factories from a variety of countries including China, Taiwan, Malaysia, Korea, Germany, U.S.A., India and South East Asia with whom we have a long and established relationship. We also manufacture many items here in the Philippines, such as our Customized Ergodynamic & Longlife Office chairs, Workstations, File Cabinets, Contract Furniture & Lifetime Interiors.

With Warehousing & Manufacturing plants in Guangdong, Shenzhen, & Tianjin China and Taguig & Bulacan Philippines, we can provide a truly national focus with a national distribution network second to none.

“Our Makati office furniture showroom is open for your use. Our web site is open 24/7.”

Our space planning and great designs allow for you to select from a multitude of co-ordinated office layouts from the front end at reception, through the administration workstation area, executive offices and meeting rooms.

From the very beginning, Cost U Less’ approach to business was highly consumer oriented – delivering the best quality product at the most economic pricing.

Sensing the growing demand for quality products, Cost U Less invested in warehousing, factories, office buildings, a showroom, workshops, logistics equipment, transportation etc.
Cost U Less’ current projects are the expansion and construction of its new state of the art Showroom and office in Makati City Philippines, and the diversification of its reach in terms of marketing & sales.


Cost U Less established a stable infrastructure that supported optimal distribution of products at the most economic terms to its customers.

Cost U Less also employed several local staff and invested in their development through education, training and experience across industries.
The group also manages an exclusive brand portfolio of Ergodynamic, Longlife, Sumo, Sumotop, Lifetime Interiors, Isafe, Factory 2 U, and Cost U Less.
On the industrial front, Cost U Less has stabilized operations in Office & Restaurant Furniture assembly and manufacturing and other products. Cost U Less’ service sector covers Fit out, Space Planning, 3D design & conceptualization and sustainability. Cost U Less’ also offers consultation services and brokerage services.		 5177 Furniture https://s3-ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/kalibrr-company-assets/logos_small_SQGQ7LK5WANS9ZBZRGBC-55485c59.jpg Cost U Less, Inc. true true costuless A DTI, IPO, SEC REGISTERED & CERTIFIED COMPANY

<li>Builds referrals &amp; leads new &amp; existing client network</li>
<li>Provide alternative Marketing methods by researching marketing trends, suggests ads placements either by conventional methods like newspaper, magazines, etc and or modern methods like online advertising, website promotions, in store promotions, thematic sale events,</li>
<li>Use sales forecasting and strategic planning with the Sales Team to ensure the sales and profitability of the Company’s product offerings and services, analyze business developments and monitors the industry’s market trends online and offline</li>
<li>Initiate market research and analyze findings in comparison with the offerings of competitors which includes price checks. Consult randomly the existing clients to gain advice regarding the types of products or services which are expected to be in demand</li>
<li>Defines, records &amp; monitors daily sales targets through Sales Calls Report &amp; New Accounts Report</li>

<li>Performs other administrative deliverables as assigned by the Country Manager and Sr. Sales Manager</li>

Someone who is self-motivated, work-dedicated, flexible and organized.</p>

<p><strong>Role</strong></p>

<p>The Virtual Receptionist provides admin support to the team and is primarily in-charge of implementing an effective phone call system, such as taking the phone calls from existing patients to make or change an appointment, diverting calls, etc. The receptionist is also involved in the documentation procedure and other admin tasks in both clinics of the client.</p>

<p><strong>Opportunites </strong></p>

<p>Our passionate Virtual Assistants/Receptionists help our clients drive their businesses forward by enabling them to focus on the important items.</p>

<p><strong>Daily duties include:</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>Handling all phone calls effectively with politeness and in professional manner, and follow the proper procedure when requested to divert the call</li>
<li>Triaging new patient referrals and schedule appointments for them</li>
<li>Managing incoming (virtual) faxes from the clinic's inbox and import them into the appropriate patient's file, then forward to the relevant doctor</li>
<li>Performing admin tasks such as reports, documentations and updating of patients' records</li>
<li>Providing support and assistance to the client’s onsite team with back-office work as required</li>
<li>Contributing to the team effort</li>
<li>Performing other duties as requested by the client or assigned by the management.</li>
</ul>		 550 false 2020-11-09T08:02:00.906006+00:00 Administration and Coordination Makati Philippines Metro Manila 157146 false false Virtual Admin | Receptionist | For Pooling 2 <ul>

<p>Be advised that this post will initially be on a Work from Home (WFH) setup until further notice that will be required to report in the office in Paseo de Roxas, Makati City.</p>

<p>CLEAR may provide the PC set for NCR-residing employees. If you opt to use your own equipment, below is the minimum requirement:</p>

<ul>
<li>Operating System: Windows 10 Pro</li>
<li>RAM: 4 GB (for 64-bit)</li>
<li>Hard Disk: 500 GB</li>
<li>Webcam: 720p resolution</li>
<li>Audio: Headset with mic (with the noise-canceling feature)</li>
</ul>

<p>To progress with your application, you shall be required to submit via email a video or an audio recording (maximum 2-minutes long) for screening purposes. We shall determine if you qualify for this role based on the submitted video/audio.</p>

<p>This role is currently for <strong>Pooling Only.</strong></p>		 99.86486486486487 true virtual-admin-receptionist-for-pooling Full time public 300 8747 Paseo de Roxas 2020-07-15T02:51:23.134431+00:00 157146 2015-03-28T20:46:06.245781+00:00 false 680 Telephone Skills 2015-05-03T18:31:43.555932+00:00 680 2020-07-15T02:51:23.134431+00:00 157146 2015-04-13T18:22:23.380108+00:00 false 881 Document management system software 2015-05-03T18:31:43.555932+00:00 881 2020-07-15T02:51:23.134431+00:00 157146 2015-04-13T18:22:23.380108+00:00 false 893 Record Keeping 2015-05-03T18:31:43.555932+00:00 893 2020-07-15T02:51:23.134431+00:00 157146 2015-05-25T03:55:01.233686+00:00 false 1439 Clerical Skills 2016-06-30T02:20:01.343690+00:00 1439 2020-07-15T02:51:23.134431+00:00 157146 2015-06-16T06:55:56.559967+00:00 false 2530 Customer Service 2016-06-30T02:20:01.343690+00:00 2530 2020-07-15T02:51:23.134431+00:00 157146 2015-07-10T06:30:53.059207+00:00 false 3803 Data Management 2016-06-30T02:20:01.343690+00:00 3803 2020-07-15T02:51:23.134431+00:00 157146 2016-06-30T02:20:01.343690+00:00 false 19759 Microsoft / MS Office 2016-06-30T02:20:01.343690+00:00 19759

2020-11-09T03:28:25.484128+00:00 2020-11-09T16:00:00+00:00 false ramesh-trading-corporation-1 RAMESH TRADING was founded in 1948 as a General Merchandise Store and as the years went by became an importer, distributor, and wholesaler of general merchandise.

In 2006, Ramesh Trading changed its business type to Corporation as part of its efforts to improve itself in the new millennium coupled with the entry of the 3rd Generation now handling the business. After over 70 years of its existence, the company has successfully branched out its endeavors into importing, wholesaling and distributorship. In 2014, the Corporation moved to a bigger facility located in Pasay City which is in line with its expansion efforts. This will further improve the company's overall efficiency and effectiveness ratings and speed up its operations.

With the company's vision of supplying every room in every household in the Philippines, we continue to deliver quality goods and services to our customers. We have branched out with our professional line of products and have also been supplying Hotels, Restaurants, Caterers, Cafes and Culinary Schools with our Industrial Grade products.

<p><strong>About the role: </strong></p>

<p>This candidate will be part of our team responsible for the entire end-to-end mortgage loan closing process within the USA Mortgage Industry.</p>

<ul>
<li>Responsible for processing loans from set-up to closing by verifying, compiling, and entering borrower information into loan processing systems.</li>
<li>Reviews loan application files to verify that all data is complete and meets standards, including the loan type and purpose, borrower assets, liabilities, and employment.</li>
<li>Verify and analyze loan documentation including income, credit, appraisal, and title, while maintaining strict compliance with all applicable federal and state regulations.</li>
<li>Interact with Mortgage Professionals to obtain information from the borrower or to seek clarification about documents in the loan file.</li>
<li>Informs the Processing Manager of discrepancies in the file and obtains direction on how to proceed, as applicable.</li>
<li>Record data to track the status of loans in processing.</li>
<li>Submit loan application files to underwriting for approval, and creates and mails approval or denial letters to applicants.</li>

processing? How to manage customer info with maximum security, integrity, cost, performance, and reliability<br>

components/services are needed to enable customer loan application via mobile and<br>
web devices?<br>

2020-11-09T03:23:54.971878+00:00 2020-11-19T16:00:00+00:00 false ramesh-trading-corporation-1 RAMESH TRADING was founded in 1948 as a General Merchandise Store and as the years went by became an importer, distributor, and wholesaler of general merchandise.

In 2006, Ramesh Trading changed its business type to Corporation as part of its efforts to improve itself in the new millennium coupled with the entry of the 3rd Generation now handling the business. After over 70 years of its existence, the company has successfully branched out its endeavors into importing, wholesaling and distributorship. In 2014, the Corporation moved to a bigger facility located in Pasay City which is in line with its expansion efforts. This will further improve the company's overall efficiency and effectiveness ratings and speed up its operations.

With the company's vision of supplying every room in every household in the Philippines, we continue to deliver quality goods and services to our customers. We have branched out with our professional line of products and have also been supplying Hotels, Restaurants, Caterers, Cafes and Culinary Schools with our Industrial Grade products.

<p><strong>Shift</strong>: Must be willing to work on a<strong> Morning</strong> <strong>Shift.</strong> Must be amenable to work on holidays and weekends.</p>

<p><strong>The Team:</strong> Joining a close-knit and professional team, you will gain broad knowledge within the financial world related to all asset classes including; Fixed Income, Commodities, Equities, etc. Moreover, you will get a grasp of different databases and our technical products.</p>

<p><strong>The Impact</strong>:</p>

<ul>
<li>You will integrate into an all-star group and will make a significant impact.</li>
<li>Your position will be meaningful as it is the link between the end-user and our products. (Specifically this product which is the Xpressfeed: https://www.spglobal.com/marketintelligence/en/solutions/xpressfeedtm)</li>
<li>Combining product expertise with a deep understanding of who our clients are and how they use our tools, you will be a consultant providing the best and most efficient way for our clients to achieve quality results.</li>
<li>You will also be an expert on the financial data in the XpressFeed platform, guiding our clients in understanding the data that they are looking at.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>What’s in it for you?</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>This position is an entry-level role with high-performance expectations. You will be working with multiple levels in the team.</li>
<li>There is the potential for advancement, learning and overall career development depending on individual performance and company need.</li>
<li>Due to frequent interactions with sales and product management, this is a highly visible role with high potential for growth outside the department as well.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></p>

<ul>
<li>As an Associate for the Xpressfeed team you will respond to inquiries for data-feed clients. You will be responsible for providing professional, timely, and quality support of our feed based products.</li>
<li>Have a deep understanding of investments, financial and accounting statements.</li>
<li>Be willing and able to work closely with partners in a team-based environment.</li>
<li>Have excellent interpersonal skills in order to effectively communicate client concerns and product related issues with all our departments. Being technologically savvy is also a plus.</li>
</ul>

<p> </p>

<p>About Statement</p>

<p>At S&amp;P Global Market Intelligence, we know that not all information is important—some of it is vital. Accurate, deep and insightful. We integrate financial and industry data, research, and news into tools that help track performance, generate alpha, identify investment ideas, understand competitive and industry dynamics, perform valuation and assess credit risk. Investment professionals, government agencies, corporations and universities globally can gain the intelligence essential to making business and financial decisions with conviction. Market Intelligence is a division of S&amp;P Global (NYSE: SPGI), which provides essential intelligence for individuals, companies, and governments to make decisions with confidence. For more information, visit: S&amp;P Global Market Intelligence.</p>

2020-11-09T03:25:50.562516+00:00 2020-11-12T16:00:00+00:00 false ramesh-trading-corporation-1 RAMESH TRADING was founded in 1948 as a General Merchandise Store and as the years went by became an importer, distributor, and wholesaler of general merchandise.

In 2006, Ramesh Trading changed its business type to Corporation as part of its efforts to improve itself in the new millennium coupled with the entry of the 3rd Generation now handling the business. After over 70 years of its existence, the company has successfully branched out its endeavors into importing, wholesaling and distributorship. In 2014, the Corporation moved to a bigger facility located in Pasay City which is in line with its expansion efforts. This will further improve the company's overall efficiency and effectiveness ratings and speed up its operations.

With the company's vision of supplying every room in every household in the Philippines, we continue to deliver quality goods and services to our customers. We have branched out with our professional line of products and have also been supplying Hotels, Restaurants, Caterers, Cafes and Culinary Schools with our Industrial Grade products.

Today in terms of product availability, quality, durability, and affordability, we at Ramesh Trading Corporation are enjoying a reputation for being one of the most reliable suppliers in the country.		 16543 Importer | Wholesaler | Distributor https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/www.kalibrr.com/logos/RRFM9A955SAR5CZBMZZJLLFGLHF9WJ3RDQL36TSK-5e1d805f.png Ramesh Trading Corporation true true ramesh-trading-corporation-1 RAMESH TRADING was founded in 1948 as a General Merchandise Store and as the years went by became an importer, distributor, and wholesaler of general merchandise.

The Senior Windows Systems Administrator will be responsible for installing, configuring, and maintaining operating system workstations and servers, including web servers, in support of business processing requirements. Performs software installations and upgrades to operating systems and layered software packages. Schedules installations and upgrades and maintains them in accordance with established IT policies and procedures. Monitors and tunes the system to achieve optimum performance levels. Develops and maintains a comprehensive operating system hardware and software configuration database/library of all supporting documentation.</p>

<p>Key Job Functions and Duties:<br>
➢ Assist in application deployment, migration, and security updates to ensure minimal down<br>
time for banking applications<br>
➢ Deploy and maintain Windows 2008/2012/2016 servers and applications in an enterprise data center environment. Audit Windows Server Environment. Thorough knowledge of Windows server management tools.<br>
➢ Thorough knowledge of Active Directory.<br>
➢ Knowledge of virtual environments (VMware and Hyper-V).<br>
➢ Administer Windows Software Update Services (WSUS – OS Update Delivery Solution).<br>
➢ Patch and Security Management - Deploy monthly OS patch and Critical patch on servers for compliance using automated tools<br>

Bolloré Transport & Logistics brings together four traditional businesses of the Bolloré Group. Bolloré Ports, Bolloré Logistics, Bolloré Railways and Bolloré Energy are four areas of business and expertise that now work together to satisfy our global clients. 2020-10-17T11:30:59.690344+00:00 2020-12-15T16:00:00+00:00 false kitchen-beauty Kitchen Beauty Marketing Corporation (KBMC) is a corporation that is taking the lead in bringing the most diversified lines of kitchen/home appliances with reliable quality, elegant designs, innovative features and affordable prices to every Filipino family, to satisfy the needs of the Philippine market by serving quality household appliances within the means of the customers through well-crafted business principles.

History

Founded in the year 1988, Kitchen Beauty Marketing started as an importer/distributor of various kitchen and household related products. Catering primarily to the mass consumer market, the company’s product ranged from stainless steel wares and small kitchen appliances.

KYOWA has been and still being recognized all throughout the country for their unwavering passion to serve and provide nothing but the best products in the market. Testifying to the slogan “Basta may Kyowa, ginhawa ka!” KYOWA continues to serve millions of Filipinos by exploring wider opportunities while providing efficient and well-selected quality products.

2020-11-09T03:40:43.173136+00:00 2021-11-08T15:33:30.478823+00:00 false ramesh-trading-corporation-1 RAMESH TRADING was founded in 1948 as a General Merchandise Store and as the years went by became an importer, distributor, and wholesaler of general merchandise.

In 2006, Ramesh Trading changed its business type to Corporation as part of its efforts to improve itself in the new millennium coupled with the entry of the 3rd Generation now handling the business. After over 70 years of its existence, the company has successfully branched out its endeavors into importing, wholesaling and distributorship. In 2014, the Corporation moved to a bigger facility located in Pasay City which is in line with its expansion efforts. This will further improve the company's overall efficiency and effectiveness ratings and speed up its operations.

With the company's vision of supplying every room in every household in the Philippines, we continue to deliver quality goods and services to our customers. We have branched out with our professional line of products and have also been supplying Hotels, Restaurants, Caterers, Cafes and Culinary Schools with our Industrial Grade products.

In 2006, Ramesh Trading changed its business type to Corporation as part of its efforts to improve itself in the new millennium coupled with the entry of the 3rd Generation now handling the business. After over 70 years of its existence, the company has successfully branched out its endeavors into importing, wholesaling and distributorship. In 2014, the Corporation moved to a bigger facility located in Pasay City which is in line with its expansion efforts. This will further improve the company's overall efficiency and effectiveness ratings and speed up its operations.

<p>As an outsourced <strong>Bookkeeper</strong>, you will:</p>

<ul>
<li>Record financial transactions into our clients’ bookkeeping systems</li>
<li>Assist the supervisors and/or managers in producing financial reports</li>
<li>Process financial documents as needed by the clients.</li>
</ul>

<p>Daily responsibilities:</p>

<ul>
<li>Recording of financial transactions and complete the posting process to Xero and other cloud-based bookkeeping systems</li>
<li>Reviewing of account codes and re-coding of transactions</li>
<li>Processing of purchase and sales invoices</li>
<li>Verifying that invoices and transactions comply with Purchase Orders</li>
<li>Processing authorised payment to supplier’s invoices in an accurate and timely manner</li>
<li>Reconciling of bank transactions, general ledger accounts and other accounts</li>
<li>Reviewing and balancing of Balance Sheet and P&amp;L account codes</li>
<li>Encoding and posting of journal entries for accounts payable and accounts receivable</li>
<li>Completing year-end GST reconciliation with ATO lodgement documentation</li>
<li>Preparing and lodging of Business and Instalment Activity Statements to the Australian Tax Office</li>
<li>Processing of payroll including payroll file payment and bank uploads</li>
<li>Processing of expense claims and reimbursements</li>
<li>Reconciling of payroll and superannuation accounts</li>
<li>Assisting with month-end accounting process including Payroll and Accounts Payable journals</li>
<li>Managing accounts payable and accounts receivable</li>
<li>Contributing to team effort by accomplishing other tasks as requested by the client and/or management.</li>

2020-10-20T02:38:15.186125+00:00 2021-01-30T16:00:00+00:00 false sky-cable-corporation ABOUT SKY

SKY Cable Corporation is the pay television and broadband arm of ABS-CBN, the Philippines’ leading media and entertainment company.

Since introducing cable television to Filipinos in 1990, it has become a frontrunner in pay TV and broadband services that offer rich content that entertain, educate, inspire, and offer experiences to Filipinos, whom it considers as its Kapamilyas.

Today, it serves Filipinos through various products under SKYdirect, SKY Fiber, and SKYcable.

SKYcable is a Pay TV service offering HD cable TV with top-notch programming and the widest selection of channels on offer by any cable provider; and SKY Fiber, a high-speed broadband for the home and beyond.

SKYdirect, now in over one million homes nationwide, brings SKY’s superior brand of cable entertainment options to more areas, beyond the urban centers via direct-to-home television technology.

SKY serves the business community through SKYBIZ, Its corporate and commercial arm, which delivers content (SKYcable) and connectivity (SKY Fiber) services to any business of any size.		 17061 Cable and Telecommunications https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/www.kalibrr.com/logos/YRBMYTQF3DTVF5CA8X8H3R9YA46P7R77P2BYHV97-5e4e207b.png Sky Cable Corporation false true sky-cable-corporation ABOUT SKY

In 2006, Ramesh Trading changed its business type to Corporation as part of its efforts to improve itself in the new millennium coupled with the entry of the 3rd Generation now handling the business. After over 70 years of its existence, the company has successfully branched out its endeavors into importing, wholesaling and distributorship. In 2014, the Corporation moved to a bigger facility located in Pasay City which is in line with its expansion efforts. This will further improve the company's overall efficiency and effectiveness ratings and speed up its operations.

<li>Able to learn and adapt on the fly in a semi-structured environment</li>
<li>Is creative and resourceful whether in solutioning or dealing with people</li>
<li>Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced, changing environment</li>
<li>Embraces the challenge of developing offerings that will provide value to customer business</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Strong Plus:</strong></p>

<ul>

2020-11-09T03:13:56.463810+00:00 2020-12-29T16:00:00+00:00 false ramesh-trading-corporation-1 RAMESH TRADING was founded in 1948 as a General Merchandise Store and as the years went by became an importer, distributor, and wholesaler of general merchandise.

In 2006, Ramesh Trading changed its business type to Corporation as part of its efforts to improve itself in the new millennium coupled with the entry of the 3rd Generation now handling the business. After over 70 years of its existence, the company has successfully branched out its endeavors into importing, wholesaling and distributorship. In 2014, the Corporation moved to a bigger facility located in Pasay City which is in line with its expansion efforts. This will further improve the company's overall efficiency and effectiveness ratings and speed up its operations.

With the company's vision of supplying every room in every household in the Philippines, we continue to deliver quality goods and services to our customers. We have branched out with our professional line of products and have also been supplying Hotels, Restaurants, Caterers, Cafes and Culinary Schools with our Industrial Grade products.

2020-10-28T07:43:37.779293+00:00 2020-12-26T16:00:00+00:00 false kitchen-beauty Kitchen Beauty Marketing Corporation (KBMC) is a corporation that is taking the lead in bringing the most diversified lines of kitchen/home appliances with reliable quality, elegant designs, innovative features and affordable prices to every Filipino family, to satisfy the needs of the Philippine market by serving quality household appliances within the means of the customers through well-crafted business principles.

History

Founded in the year 1988, Kitchen Beauty Marketing started as an importer/distributor of various kitchen and household related products. Catering primarily to the mass consumer market, the company’s product ranged from stainless steel wares and small kitchen appliances.

KYOWA has been and still being recognized all throughout the country for their unwavering passion to serve and provide nothing but the best products in the market. Testifying to the slogan “Basta may Kyowa, ginhawa ka!” KYOWA continues to serve millions of Filipinos by exploring wider opportunities while providing efficient and well-selected quality products.

Bolloré Transport & Logistics makes all of its areas of expertise available to its clients, including construction and operation of port terminals and railway lines, freight forwarding and Oil logistics, based on the expertise of 36,000 employees in 105 countries.

(WCLI) is the pioneer in manufacturing melamine boards (ParticleBoard, MDF, Plywood), Membrane Doors, Solid Surface, Phenolic &amp; Compact Boards in the Philippines. It is a service-oriented company that provides the local construction industry with world-class boards for furniture, cabinets, closets, walls, partitions and other interior requirements.<br>

The role requires a collaborative spirit, an understanding of Strategic Sourcing processes and program management best practices, and the ability to support the implementation and development of program principles within S&amp;P.</p>

<p><strong>Job Responsibilities</strong></p>

<ul>

The customer will implement a solution that will address its needs for data storage, data management, data applications and the migration of existing data, ETL jobs, reports and dashboards to a data lake. The Service Delivery Lead will lead the data migration project together with the Business Enabling Teams through collaborative planning, execution, and monitoring of the project to ensure on-time, on-scope, and on-budget delivery by having a thorough understanding of the technical design, process flows, and data flows that ensures adherence to both business and technical requirements and standards. <p><strong>Key Job Functions and Duties: </strong></p>

<ul>
<li>Develop preliminary project, services, high level costs and timeline.</li>

<p>As <strong>Sales Specialist</strong>, you are expected (but not limited to):</p>

<ul>

<li>Be aware of performance vs expectation on leading metrics</li>

<li>Ensure that the 1-hr Hot Lead SLA is met</li>

<li>Look for additional sales opportunities through reorder or upsell during SAM cadence</li>
<li>Know how to calculate margin and where to look for cost information</li>
<li>Build a pipeline sufficient to deliver your sales plan</li>
<li>Manage your pipeline by: - Ensure compliance to sales qualification requirement - Timely follow-up on opportunities - Take lead and proactively communicate with partners on channel deals to ensure follow-through - Raise urgent issues that pose a risk</li>
<li>Proactively share and collaborate with territory counterpart once opportunities are identified • Share product feedback and market insight with RND team in a timely manner</li>

<br>
Main duties and responsibilities:<br>
• Manage end-to-end digital projects.<br>
• Establish our web presence to boost brand awareness.<br>
• Maintain a strong online company voice through social media using campaigns.<br>
• Support the Sales and Marketing Team with marketing activities by demonstrating expertise in various areas, including search optimization, advertising, social media, direct marketing, and events management.<br>
• Ensure creative marketing materials undergo regular review and adhere to brand guidelines.<br>
• Suggest and implement direct marketing methods to increase profitability.<br>
• Plan, develop, and execute digital programs and campaigns, including online advertising, website strategy and design, social media, mobile, and deliverables.<br>
• Interface with marketing communications functions, as well as PR, events, retail, and business product marketing teams.<br>
• Present recommendations to the Marketing Manager.<br>
• Research potential vendors for marketing collaterals, negotiating for contract terms and pricing, and reviewing the quality of purchased products.<br>
• Perform accurate tracking / inventory of marketing collateral.<br>
• Undertake competitor research and analyses.<br>
• Establish goals and objectives in order to reach our customers through appropriate marketing channels (digital and traditional).<br>
• Closely track marketing strategy results and create detailed reports with data analysis and other feedback.<br>

➢ Interfaces with the software vendor for any additional support required.<br>

the Finacle banking technology platform.<br>

➢ Lead technical design discussions with stakeholders. <p><strong>Reporting structure:</strong><br>
The Finacle Developer reports to the Core Banking Systems lead.</p>		 100 true finacle-developer Full time public 300
2020-10-08T09:35:19.844862+00:00 2020-12-30T16:00:00+00:00 25000 false fast-retailing-inc-uniqlo UNIQLO LifeWear

Apparel that comes from the Japanese values of simplicity, quality and longevity. Designed to be of the time and for the time, LifeWear is made with such modern elegance that it becomes the building blocks of each individual’s style. A perfect shirt that is always being made more perfect. The simplest design hiding the most thoughtful and modern details. The best in fit and fabric made to be affordable and accessible to all. LifeWear is clothing that is constantly being innovated, bringing more warmth, more lightness, better design, and better comfort to people’s lives.

UNIQLO and Fast Retailing

UNIQLO is a brand of Fast Retailing Co., Ltd., a leading global Japanese retail holding company that designs, manufactures and sells clothing under seven main brands: Comptoir des Cotonniers, GU, Helmut Lang, J Brand, Princesse tam.tam, Theory, and UNIQLO. With global sales of approximately 1.8619 trillion yen for the 2017 fiscal year ending August 31, 2017 (US $16.87 billion, calculated in yen using the end of August 2017 rate of $1 = 110.4 yen), Fast Retailing is one of the world’s largest apparel retail companies, and UNIQLO is Japan’s leading specialty retailer.

UNIQLO continues to open large-scale stores in some of the world's most important cities and locations, as part of its ongoing efforts to solidify its status as a truly global brand. Today the company has more than 1,900 stores in 19 markets worldwide including Japan, Australia, Belgium, Canada, China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Malaysia, Philippines, Russia, Singapore, South Korea, Spain, Taiwan, Thailand, U.K. and the U.S. In addition, Grameen UNIQLO, a social business established in Bangladesh in September 2010, currently operates several Grameen UNIQLO stores in Dhaka. UNIQLO manages an integrated business model under which it designs, manufactures, markets and sells high-quality, casual apparel. The company believes that truly great clothes should be supremely comfortable, feature universal designs, are of high quality and offer a superb fit to everyone who wears them.

With a corporate statement committed to changing clothes, changing conventional wisdom and change the world, Fast Retailing is dedicated to creating great clothing with new and unique value to enrich the lives of people everywhere. For more information about UNIQLO and Fast Retailing, please visit www.uniqlo.com and www.fastretailing.com.		 9668 Retail Industry https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/EXQFZEE2LX2Q7XMG2S8LTGXT25ANS6QCXW377JDW-5a5c5850.png Fast Retailing Philippines, Inc.  false Banking/Financial Institutions false https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/www.kalibrr.id/logos/FFJRER237VT5PKS9YLNCJKMYADFB2VFLV5LE4WL9-5e6f2472.jpg https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/www.kalibrr.id/logos/TYP7K4CHVT3D63WZB6F24Q3QU49A6MHWP53BTJ38-5e6f2474.jpg https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/www.kalibrr.id/logos/QR236EWEZQL8WCYQ9NA9PMW2LBNT4BSUVL22HYSB-5e6f2473.png https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/www.kalibrr.id/logos/G68JYB7W4KHR998MA9HW7YCC697FMDEC4Z3239R5-5e6f2472.png CIMB Bank Philippines https://www.cimbbank.com.ph/en/home.html CIMB Bank Philippines 2020-10-05T06:12:26.582227+00:00 <p>The Key Responsibilities of the Compliance Manager (Compliance Review &amp; AML Operations Officer) are as follows:</p>

<p>1. Conduct Compliance review on the controls implementation and regulatory risks within the business units.</p>

<ul>
<li>Oversee completion of business units of the Compliance Self-Asessment Matrix and reporting of the results to the Chief Compliance Officer (CCO) and CIMB Bank Philipippines Senior Management.</li>
<li>Work closely with the DCOROs and HODs of respective business units in conducting independent testing to oversee effectiveness of controls and access inherent compliance risks.</li>
<li>Ensure implementation of the Annual Compliance Risk Asessement Methodology.</li>
</ul>

<p>2. Manage and monitor compliance breaches/potential suspected non-compliance or any irregularities to the regulation.</p>

<ul>
<li>Coordinate with business units in conducting root cause and impact analysis of identified regulatory and AML/CFT breaches.</li>
<li>Monitor and ensure that the business units has taken/will take appropriate remidial actions and establish preventive measures to avoid recurrence.</li>
</ul>

<p>3. Ensure timely and accurate reporting of AML/CFT related reports</p>

<ul>
<li>
<p>Coordinates with the concerned business units of the timely preparation of the suspicious transaction report.</p>
</li>
<li>Reviews STRs prepared and revise, if necessary, to ensure that information is complete and in accordance to AMLC’s reporting standards and transmits the final STR through the AMLC portal after securing the AML/CFT Committee’s approval.</li>
<li>Ensure the accurate, complete and tinmely reporting of covered and suspisious transactions, reports on crimes and losses, and handling of AML-related court cases (i.e. Freeze Orders)</li>
</ul>

<p><br>
4. Ensure prompt and appropriate disposition of alerts generated through AML Detica System</p>

<ul>
<li>Periodically review alerts to determine if there are generated in accordance to the defined parameters and thresholds.</li>
<li>Conduct root cause analysis of any concerns emanating from the review and recommend appropriate system enhancements to resolve alert issues.</li>
<li>Review the alerts generated and conduct preliminary assessment and verification on the transactions.</li>
<li>Dispose transaction alerts promptly and document action taken based on verification conducted.</li>
</ul>

<p>5. Manages and analyses customer data, transaction details and other available data to provide comprehensive management reports.</p>

<p>6. Promote a culture of compliance awareness</p>

<ul>
<li>Assist the Chief Compliance Officer (CCO) to strategize and plan to promote AML/CFT compliance culture across CIMB Bank Philippines.</li>
</ul>		 550 false 2020-11-09T07:56:29.959094+00:00 Legal Taguig Philippines Metro Manila 162076 false false Compliance Manager 1 1 <p><u><strong>Qualifications:</strong></u></p>

<ul>
<li>Responsible in facilitating daily scrum, sprint planning, sprint demo and retrospective meetings.</li>
<li>Tracks work progress to identify blockages and developer divergence from allocated tasks</li>
<li>Blocks Business, Operational Staff and Product owners from interference with</li>
<li>Development Structure</li>
<li>Polices channels for submission of development work requests</li>
<li>Implements structure changes and strategy that are generated by agile retrospectives</li>
<li>High velocity communicator - making sure that all information regarding changes in scope, delays and other detrimental events are communicated to those involved with the piece of work as soon as they arise</li>
<li>Blocks stories that do not contain the right level of detail from entering the Dev Structure</li>
<li>Blocks changes to work once in development without following the proper reevaluation process</li>
<li>Removes blockers with extreme prejudice when raised by development team</li>
</ul>		 550 false 2020-11-09T08:22:43.198340+00:00 IT and Software Taguig Philippines Metro Manila 134859 false false Scrum Master 1 1 <p>Qualifications:</p>

<ul>
<li>Understand basic fundamentals of iterative development</li>
<li>Understand other processes and methodologies and can speak intelligently about them and leverage other techniques to provide value to a team or enterprise</li>
<li>Understand basic fundamentals of software development processes and procedures</li>
<li>Understand the value of commitments to delivery made by a development team</li>
<li>Understand incremental delivery and the value of metrics</li>
<li>Understand backlog tracking, burndown metrics, velocity, and task definition</li>
<li>Familiarity with common Agile practices, service-oriented environments, and better development practices</li>

<p><strong>TRENDS</strong> empowers our clients with technology-enabled business services allowing them to transcend. Topping the Philippine ICT industry for more than 25 years and catering to different organizations across industries, we prioritize customer satisfaction by delivering only the best and most effective services. We usher our clients into the digital future by harnessing the power of technology and our years of expertise. To stay true to our commitment to excellence and providing innovative and sustainable services, we have expanded with regional offices in Clark, Cavite, Laguna, Cebu and Davao and international offices in Vietnam and Cambodia.</p>

<p>The training will run for three (3) weeks from 8:30 AM to 6PM, Mondays to Fridays. An allowance shall be provided to the trainees (400 Php per day) and will be given on the last day of the training. During the program, the trainees will be equipped with knowledge about technical, customer service, communication, and presentation skills. The trainer will measure each trainee based on his/her performance, assessments, attendance, and behavior.</p>

<p>On the last day of training, the trainees will undergo through revalidation process and will get a chance to be hired as an employee of <strong>Trends Group Inc.</strong></p>

<li>Systems Engineer</li>

- We’re not a BPO. You’re more than just a number.
- Our PH team are equal with onshore team. We’re not an ‘outsourced team’ that is managed remotely.
- You report directly to the company and not the BPO itself.
- You'll be included in the company strategy and get international business experience.
- You’re not just a "number"
- We’re a small team and have a more ‘tight knit’ culture.		 23961 IT and Software https://rec-data.kalibrr.com/logos/MVTFAJUHWV7STZS84FQXGGJ4KPF6TQ4K9GA9J8LV-5bf63a54.png Ready Group Global true true ready-group-global Ready Group Global delivers IT Enterprise Architecture for Accounting Firms through the provision of projects, services and products. <li>Provide ‘fix on first call’ to customers</li>
<li>Manage lifecycle of service tickets in line with established service level agreement with clients</li>

</ul>

2020-11-09T03:25:10.863042+00:00 2020-11-14T16:00:00+00:00 false ramesh-trading-corporation-1 RAMESH TRADING was founded in 1948 as a General Merchandise Store and as the years went by became an importer, distributor, and wholesaler of general merchandise.

In 2006, Ramesh Trading changed its business type to Corporation as part of its efforts to improve itself in the new millennium coupled with the entry of the 3rd Generation now handling the business. After over 70 years of its existence, the company has successfully branched out its endeavors into importing, wholesaling and distributorship. In 2014, the Corporation moved to a bigger facility located in Pasay City which is in line with its expansion efforts. This will further improve the company's overall efficiency and effectiveness ratings and speed up its operations.

We have branched out with our professional line of products and have also been supplying Hotels, Restaurants, Caterers, Cafes and Culinary Schools with our Industrial Grade products.

Being one of the Philippines’ leading conglomerates, whose investments, experience and expertise are showcased in their core businesses which are real estate, banking, hospitality and leasing, sugar, and power, the Filinvest Group has further diversified into the water business through CWSI.

CWSI was incorporated on May 18, 2012. CWSI has the technical expertise and skills in the operation, management, maintenance, and rehabilitation of waterworks and sewerage systems of its residential projects. Since August 2, 2012, Filinvest Land, Inc. (FLI) has engaged the services of CWSI in order to maintain and further improve the billing, collection, and customer relation services in the waterworks and sewerage systems of FLI’s real estate projects.

CWSI also is involved in the operation and maintenance of Filinvest Alabang, Inc.’s (FAI) water, sanitation and sewerage treatment plants in their flagship project, The Filinvest Corporate City – Alabang. This includes services for the supply, distribution, and sale of potable water to domestic, commercial, and industrial users. CWSI is also involved in the construction, maintenance, and the operation of all necessary and convenient buildings, structures, reservoirs, and other waterworks facilities.

The company aims to be a leading supplier of bulk water to the various water districts and local government units (LGU). CWSI continues to discuss and negotiate with several water districts and LGUs forging partnerships which would serve the interest of the people in their localities.
CWSI is mainly responsible for the water supply and wastewater system requirements of Filinvest in recently awarded projects namely the Bases Conversion and Development Authority (BCDA)’s Clark Green City Project involving 288 hectares development and the Clark Development Corporation (CDC)’s lease and operation of the former Mimosa Leisure and Resorts, a 220-hectare prime property in Clarkfield, Pampanga.
